answer_b: Banannyonnyola obukulu bw’abakungu okulondebwa okusalawo ku nsonga ezikwata ku bantu bonna.
answer_c: Banannyonnyola emirimu egikulu egy'abakungu abakiikirira abantu bwe bamala okulondebwa.
answer_d: Bikola eby'enjawulo ku ngeri z'okwetaba mu demokulasiya ezibaawo mu bulamu bw'abantu n'ebitundu byabwe eby'okumpi.

question: Omusomesa, bw'aba ng'atandika okwogera ku nsonga z'empisa ennungi n'embi, ayogera ku nsonga nti ekyo ekirungi eri abamu si kirungi eri abalala. Mu kwetaba ku kino, omuyizi agamba: "Bino bye bintu ebyesigamiziddwa ku ndowooza y'omuntu era mu nkomerero buli kimu kyesigamiziddwa ku ndowooza y'omuntu, y'ensonga lwaki ebintu ebimu bituufu eri abamu ate si bituufu eri abalala." Buzibu ki obusobola okukirizika mu kwetaba kw'omuyizi kuno?
answer_a: Okutegeera endowooza y’obuntu ng’ekintu ekifaanana ng’okukkiriza nti empisa zikyuka okusinziira ku muntu.
answer_b: Okukakasa obutakyuka bw'emisango gy'empisa nga tusinziira ku ndowooza z'abantu kinnoomu ezitali zimu
answer_c: Okwekenneenya ng’entandikwa y’enkulakulana y’empisa ennungi.
answer_d: Okuteebereza nti engeri emisingi gy’empisa gye gitambuliramu kyava mu bulowoozi bwaffe nga buli omu.

question: Omusomesa akolera mu kibiina ky'empisa ku ndowooza y'obulungi ya Aritootle. Asaba abayizi be okuwa ebyokulabirako by'ebikolwa oba embeera obulungi gye bulabikira. Omuyizi agamba nti "omuntu asoma ennyo alina empisa ng'omuntu azannya emipiira mingi." Mu ngeri ki omusomesa gy'ayinza okuyambamu omuyizi okulongoosa ekirowoozo kye okusobola okutegeera obulungi empisa za Aritootle?
answer_a: Omusomesa ajjukiza omuyizi emisingi gy'empisa ennungi.
answer_b: Omusomesa asaba omuyizi okunnyonnyola ky’ategeera mu mugatte ogwa zaabu.
answer_c: Omusomesa alung'amya omuyizi okujjukira nti obuntu bulamu butera okwagala ekirungi.
answer_d: Omusomesa asaba omuyizi okulowooza oba abazannyi balina obusobozi obw'omuzaaliranwa okukola omuzannyo gwe baagala.

question: Omusomesa mu ssomero lya siniya agenderera abayizi be okusobola okwawula wakati w’empisa ezeyimiriddeewo n’empisa ezisinziira ku biragiro by’abalala mu nkola z’empisa ezitali zimu. Kiki ekikolwa ekyandibadde ekisinga okutuukirawo abayizi be okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky’okuyiga ekyateekebwawo?
answer_a: Omusomesa akola eki chart ku lubaawo ng’alaga endowooza enkulu ez’enteekateeka y’empisa ey’obuntu eya Sartre n’enteekateeka ya Kant.
answer_b: Omusomesa akola era n’annyonnyola eri abayizi maapu y’endowooza erimu ebirowoozo by’empisa za Kantian ne hedonistic, nga yeesigamiziddwa ku nsibuko oba ebiragiro by’emitindo gy’omuntu kinnoomu.
answer_c: Omusomesa asaba abayizi okukola omukungaanyo ogulina ebirowoozo ebikulu eby'enteekateeka z'empisa eza Aristotle ne Kant, nga balowooza ku nsibuko y'amateeka eri omuntu kinnoomu.
answer_d: Omusomesa awamu n'abayizi be bakola ekiweebwa eky'okugeraageranya ekyesigamiziddwa ku bigendererwa ebiri mu nkola z'empisa eziteereddwawo abantu abagoberera essanyu n'abastoiki.

question: Omusomesa akoze omulimu mu mwaka ogw’okuna ogw’ekisulo kya waggulu ku kiruubirirwa kino: “Okusisinkana endowooza ku buzibu bw’empisa z’omulembe ogwa leero.” Obuzibu omusomesa bw’akozesezza n’abayizi kwe kunnyonnyola ensalo wakati w’ebyabonna n’ebyekinnoomu okusinziira ku ndowooza ya Arendt n’ebiragiro eby’amagezi ebirala, ng’abigatta ku nkola y’ebyuma bya tekinologiya leero. Ku nkomerero y’omulimu, kitegekeddwa okukebera obukugu bw’abayizi bwe batuuseeko. Ku bikolwa by’abayizi bino wammanga, kiki ekiraga obulungi okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa kino?
answer_a: Balaga engeri ez’enjawulo ez’ekifirosoofa n’ezitali za kifirosoofa okutegeera entikko z’ebintu ebya lukale n’eby’ekyama
answer_b: Bategeera ensonga ezikakasa endowooza yaabwe ku bwereere n’ekyama leero, nga balowooza ku biwandiiko bya bafilozofa bye twakozesezza mu kibiina.
answer_c: Bagerageranya ebirowoozo byabwe n'eby'omuyizi munnaabwe ku nsalo z'ekifo ky'abantu bonna n'eky'ekyama mu nkola y'emikutu gy'ebyemikwanira, nga balowooza ku biwandiiko bya bafilozofa bye baakozesa mu kibiina.
answer_d: Bazza bazimba eby’obufuzi ku nkola y’ekyama ku mitimbagano gy’ebyemikutu, nga bakozesa endowooza okuva mu bafilozofa ab’edda, aba kati oba ab’omulembe guno.

question: Mu mutwe gw'okukebera, omusomesa asaba abayizi be okwekenneenya omulandira gw'amateeka ag'okulowooza obulungi Descartes ge yawaayo mu "Discourse on the Method." Ku ngeri zino wammanga, ngeri ki entuufu eraga omutindo gw'omulimu ogwo era ng'ekwatagana n'ebyo ebyettanirwa okuyigibwa?
answer_a: Bagamba nti enkola eno bw’eteekateeka amateeka mu mutindo gw’obukulu, eba nsongovu.
answer_b: Balondoola ensonga esooka evaako buli kimu ku mateeka.
answer_c: Bategeera buli kimu ku mateeka agagobererwa mu nkola ya "Cartesian".
answer_d: Bannyonnyola enjawulo eriwo wakati w'amateeka gonna agafuga okulowooza okutuufu

question:
Omusomesa omukulu mu ssomero lya siniya, mu kiseera ky’akola omutwe "Chile mu makkati g’ekyasa ekya 20", asalawo okukozesa okubuuza ebizibu ng’enkola y’okukebera. Oluvannyuma lw’okulaga ebifaananyi eby’edda ebikwata ku mbeera embi ey’abantu ababeera mu bibuga, omusomesa abuuza abayizi ekibuuzo kino: "Singa okuva mu myaka gya 1930, gavumenti zaali zikubirizzaawo enkola y’obuyambi bw’abantu okukendeeza obutabanguko mu bantu, obulabirizi bw’amayumba amabi n’embeera embi ey’oku nguudo mu Santiago bisobola bitya okunnyonnyolwa?"
Ku mirimu egiddwa wano wansi, gwe gumu ogusobola okukozesebwa okusiima okuyita mu mulimu ogunnyonnyoddwa?
answer_a: Bageraageranya embeera z'obulamu ez'enjawulo ezaaliwo mu bibuga wakati mu kyasa ekya 20
answer_b: Balaga engeri y’ebifo eby’enjawulo ebyamerukamu ebyalo by’ebimenyebimenye mu makkati g’ekyasa ekya 20.
answer_c: Balaga engeri enzirukanya y'emirimu gya gavumenti gye yakosa okukulaakulana kw'ekibuga mu kitundu ky'emyaka ekisooka mu kyasa ekya 20.
answer_d: Banannyonnyola ensonga lwaki gavumenti ezikola ku bulamu bw’abantu zaakolebwa n’ensonga lwaki zaatandikibwawo mu kitundu ekisooka eky’ekyasa ekya 20.

question: Omusomesa agamba abayizi be abali mu mwaka ogwokusatu mu siniya nti mu kitundu "Okusattulukuka kw'obufuzi obwa demokulasi", ekigendererwa kino kyakukolerwako mu bibinja: "Okwekenneenya okusattulukuka kw'obufuzi obwa demokulasi nga tuyita mu ngeri ez'enjawulo ezikireetawo". N'olwekyo, abasaba okunoonya amawulire agakwata ku kiseera ekyo mu nsibuko ez'enjawulo. Oluvannyuma, annyonnyola nti okusinziira ku mawulire ago, mu bibinja, bagenda kugabana bye banoonye n'ekibiina kyonna. Emu ku bibinja ebuuza omusomesa oba kiba kirungi okukola olulimi lw'ebiseera okuva mu 1970-1973, nga balaga ebintu eby'omugaso ebyaliwo mu byafaayo. Omusomesa, bw'amaze okuwulira, abasaba okunoonya engeri endala ey'okwanjula, kubanga omulimu oguteereddwawo tegwakubasobozesa kutuukiriza kigendererwa kye balondedde. Lwaki olulimi lw'ebiseera terutuukana n'ekigendererwa ekyateereddwawo eri abayizi?
answer_a: Kubanga kisinziira ku kunoonyereza okukwatagana n'obudde obwenkanya, mu kifo ky'okukozesa endowooza ezitali zimu.
answer_b: Kubanga kyawulawo ebifaananira ddala mu byafaayo, mu kifo ky’okuteekawo enkola y’obukulu okusinziira ku bukulu bwabyo.
answer_c: Kubanga kikendeeza okunoonyereza ku ndaba ey'oluse olugolokofu olw'ebintu ebyabaddewo, mu kifo ky'okutegeera enkola y'eby'emabega.
answer_d: Kubanga kyangu okusengeka ebintu ebyaliwo mu nnambika, mu kifo ky’okubigattika okusinziira ku njatula ez’enjawulo eziri mu nkola y’eby’afaayo.

question: Abayizi mu kibiina ekyokusatu balina okukiikirira engeri ebyafaayo by'omulembe ogwa kati gye byagenda bitondeka okusinziira ku mulembe omukulu ow'ebyafaayo Eric Hobsbawm gwe yassaawo, nga bakola olukalala lw'ebiseera. Okusobola okutuukiriza omulimu guno, omusomesa yabawadde ebiragiro bino: 'Laga ekitundu ekikiikirira "ekyasa ekya 19 ekiwanvu" n'ekitundu ekigatta "ekyasa ekya 20 ekimpi".' Kyokka, bwe yamaze okukebera ebyo abaana bye baakoze, bingi byali bikyamu, nga bwe kiragiddwa mu kyokulabirako kino: Miteeko ki egirina okugattibwa mu bayizi okusobola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky'omulimu ogwateereddwawo?
answer_a: Ekintu eky'omugaso ennyo n'embeera enzibu
answer_b: Obugendererevu n'enkyukakyuka
answer_c: Obudde obw'ebyafaayo n'obudde obuteebereza.
answer_d: Ensibuko n'ebivaamu

question: Ku nkomerero y’ekibiina ekikwata ku “Enkola y’Akatale,” omusomesa akola okukebera okw’omukutu okumanya oba abayizi be bategeera ebintu ebireetawo enkyukakyuka mu bwetaavu bw’ekintu. N’olwekyo, omusomesa abasaba okulonda okuva mu by’okulabirako ebiwerako okukozesa embeera eno ku bulamu obwa bulijjo. Mu by’okulabirako bino wammanga, kiki ekikwatagana n’omukozi w’omuyizi akolerera okutuukiriza ekyo omusomesa ky’asuubira?
answer_a: José: Emyaka nga ebiri emabega, nnali nzimba caaka za chocolate ku kiyosiki ky’essomero, naye okuva etteeka lwe lyakyuka, kati nzirina okuzigula wabweru n’okuzireeta mu nsawo yange ey’omukono.
answer_b: Claudia: Wiiki ewedde twagenda ku mizannyo n'abakozi baffe, naye olw'okuba twakererewa, tetwasobola kufuna tiketi, kwe kusalawo okukozesa ssente ku pizza ne sandwiichi.
answer_c: Jacqueline: Mu luwummula olw'ekyeya, twategeka ne tupangisa ekisaawe okuzannyira omupiira gw'ebigere omulundi gumu buli wiiki, kale nneetaaga okuba ne pesos 1,200 buli wiiki.
answer_d: Ignacio: Okutuusa omwaka oguwedde, nnali nkolaasa ssente ze bampa ku byuma ebikwata ku alubaamu, naye kati olw’okuba sikyagala alubaamu, nterekera ssente ezo okuzikozesa ku kintu ekirala.

question:
Mu mutera gw'essomo "Ebitundu n'enkyukakyuka mu nkola y'ebyenfuna n'ensimbi", omusomesa agenda okwekenneenya n'abayizi be ab'omwaka ogusooka mu siniya enkola y'akatale ng'asinziira ku ngeri ebintu gye biteekebwamu ebbi. N'olwekyo, asalawo okutandika ekibiina n'omulamwa gw'obunnabbi era n'ebyokulabirako ebimu.

Nga twekenneenya embeera eno, kumanya ki abayizi kwe balina okuba nakwo okusobola okutegeera omulamwa ogutandikawo?
answer_a: Omusingi gw'ebbula ly'ebintu
answer_b: Etteeka ly'obusobozi bw'okugula
answer_c: Omulamwa gw'ebbula ly'ebbeeyi
answer_d: Omulamwa gw'okuyingiza data

question: Omusomesa, oluvannyuma lw’okumaliriza omutwe ogugamba ku “Enkola y’amateeka”, agenda kunnyonnyola kiki kye yandikoze okusobola okukakasa oba abayizi be ab’omu mwaka ogw’okuna mu siniya basobodde okutegeera emisingi egigendererwa mu mateeka. Ku bino ebikolebwa wammanga, kiki ekiyinza okumuyambako okukung’aanya obujulizi okusobola okukebera oba ekigendererwa kituukiddwaako?
answer_a: Okukozesa ensibuko, nnyonnyola omulimu gw'eggwanga mu kukuuma obwetwaze bw'ettaka lyalyo.
answer_b: Laga ng'ekyokulabirako okuva mu mawulire eky'omukulu w'ekitongole kya gavumenti ng'annyonnyola ebikolwa bye.
answer_c: Enyonyola obuvunaanyizibwa bw'eggwanga okukuuma obulungi bwa bonna
answer_d: Enjawulo ku bukulu bw’okwetaba mu kulonda mu kutondawo eggwanga

question: Omusomesa ow'ekibina eky'okubiri ali ku mulembe gw'Abayonaani n'Abaruumi n'abayizi be era, ng'ekimu ku bikolebwa mu kibiina, agabanya ekibiina mu bibinja, ng'awa buli kibinja kaadi eraga ekintu ekikulu mu mirembe egyo, gamba nga: ekizannyo, amateeka, obuzimbe n'ebifaananyi, enfumo, amagezi, olulimi, n'ebirala. Buli kibinja kirina okunoonyereza ku kintu kye baweereddwa nga bakozesa ebintu omusomesa by'abawadde era balage ebintu byakyo ebikyaliwo leero n'ebitakyaliwo. Omusomesa ayinza okuba ng'asinga kwesigama ku mulamwa gwaki ogw'okuyigiriza ebyafaayo ng'akozesa omulimu guno n'abayizi be?
answer_a: Obutalekereraawo
answer_b: Obunnabulizi
answer_c: Enkyukakyuka n’enkulakulana
answer_d: Obugendererevu n'enkyukakyuka

question:
Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okusatu abadde akolera wamu n’abayizi ku mbeera ez’enjawulo ez’obulamu obwa bulijjo obw’Abayonaani ab’edda. Bwe babadde boogera ku nteekateeka y’embeera z’abantu mu byafaayo eby’edda, omuyizi agamba nti: “Abayonaani baali babi”. Omusomesa amubuuza lwaki ayogera bw’atyo, omuyizi n’amuddamu: “Kubanga baalina abaddu”.
Nsobi ki mu kunoonyereza ku byafaayo erabika mu byo omuyizi by’ayogedde?
answer_a: Akebera ebintu ebikulu mu buwangwa bw'Abayonaani ng'ayoleka obusosoze mu mawanga.
answer_b: Yeenyigira mu kukyamya engeri abantu ba Giriki gye baali batengejjerwamu n'engeri Abaruumi gye baali batengejjerwamu.
answer_c: Ateenyoomereza busiraani bw'obuwangwa bw'Abayonaani eri embeera z'abantu ez'omulembe guno
answer_d: Amuwandiikira ebintu eby'omugaso mu byafaayo by'Abayonaani ng'akozesa ebipimo ebiriwo kati.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekinaana akuŋŋaanya abayizi mu bibinja n’abasaba okunoonya amawulire ku yintaneeti agakwata ku butonde bw’ensi obusangibwa mu Chile. Oluvannyuma, abasaba okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw’obutonde obwo, ekyandibaddewo singa bubula, n’engeri gye tuyinza okubukuuma leero. Mu nkomerero, buli kibinja kirina okwanjula ebyo bye bazuulidde mu maaso g’ekibiina. Kitiisa ki omusomesa ky’asinga okugenderera okukulaakulanya okuyita mu mulimu ogwo waggulu?
answer_a: Okubuuliriza
answer_b: Okulowooza okukwata ku bwagaagavu
answer_c: Okukozesa obubaka obw'ebifo ebitali bimu (Sources)
answer_d: Okulowooza okw'amagezi

question:
Omusomesa ow’ekibiina eky’okusatu ayagala okutandika omutwe ogw’Obuyonaani ng’ayanjula abayizi be eri embeera y’obuwangwa eno mwe yakulira era n’okwekenneenya engeri gye yagikolerako.
Maapu ya ngeri ki esinga okuba etuukirawo okukozesebwa okutuukiriza ekigendererwa omusomesa ky’ateekawo?
answer_a: Eby'omubiri
answer_b: Ebyobufuzi
answer_c: Eby'enfuna
answer_d: Eby'obudde

question: Omusomesa ow’ekika kya ‘kindergarten’ agenda okukebera ekigendererwa kino ekikulu eky’okuyiga okumanya embeera z’abantu n’ennono zaabwe: “Okunoonyereza ku bikozesebwa mu nnyumba n’ebyuma bya tekinologiya ebiri mu bulamu obwa bulijjo, gamba nga: ebibya, ebintu omuterekebwa amazzi, emyeezo, ebijiko, amasimu, n’ebirala, ng’abikozesa buli lunaku mu mbeera ezitali zimu ne mu mizannyo.” Kiki omwana ky’alaga ekiraga nti atuukirizza ekigendererwa kino eky’okuyiga?
answer_a: Yogera amannya g'ebintu eby'omulembe nga essimu n'essaawa.
answer_b: Kozesa ebintu ebikozesebwa mu nnyumba, gamba ng’ekikopo n’akajiiko, okuzannya ng’olya.
answer_c: Kukwata, okukozesa n'okukuba ebivuga nga okukozesa ebintu ebiri mu nnyumba, gamba nga bbakuli n'ebijiiko.
answer_d: Tegeka ebintu bya tekinologiya, gamba nga essimu entono n’essimu enkulu, mu kifo ekituufu eky’okuzannyira.

question: Mu kibiina kya ‘kindergarten’, omusomesa agenda kukozesa empapula z’okwetegereza ng’ekyakukozesebwa okukebera okuyiga kw’abaana abato okusinziira ku biragiro bino ebikwata ku mutima gw’okutegeera embeera z’obuwangwa n’obulamu: Anyumya ku bikolwa eby’omumulembe mu kitundu kyabwe. Annyonnyola engeri gy’etabamu mu bikolwa eby’omumulembe mu kitundu kyabwe. Kiki ekiyigirizibwa ekiyinza okukozesebwa okwetegereza okukakasa ebyo abaana bye batuuseeko okukwatagana n’ebiragiro ebyo?
answer_a: Loboza ebikolwa ebibaawo mu kitundu ky'ebyenjigiriza.
answer_b: Mubu mwe muli okwaniriza, baagala okumanya kye mwakola ku wiikendi.
answer_c: Nga mukuŋŋaanidde mu bubinja obutono, mukoppe ebikolwa bya bulijjo bye mukola awaka.
answer_d: Mu bibinja, mukubaganye ebirowoozo ku mirimu ab'omu maka gye bakola mu mikolo gy'amasanyu.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina ekyokusatu mu kukebera okw’okubumbulukusa akizuula nti newankubadde abayizi be bakuguse mu kutegeera ebyo basoma, balina obuzibu mu kuwanika n’okuwakanya endowooza zaabwe. Ng’asinziira ku mbeera eno, omusomesa agenda kuteekateeka omulimu ogugenda okusobozesa abayizi okutereeza engeri gye bakolamu. Ku mirimu egiddwa wano wansi, mulimu ki ogwandibadde omutuufu okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a: Omusomesa akola, awamu n'abayizi be, akatabo akalimu ebika by'okulambulula ebirowoozo eby'enjawulo, engeeranyo, n'obulimba, ng'abannyonnyola engeri gye balina okukozesaamu ebintu bino mu kuwandiika kwabwe.
answer_b: Omusomesa akola ebibinja by’okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bikwata ku nkola ya Firosoofa ng’ekikolwa eky’okulambika ebirowoozo. Oluvannyuma, abayizi balina okukola okulambika kwabwe nga boogera ku ngeri gye balaba ensonga eyo.
answer_c: Omusomesa asaba abayizi okunoonya amawulire ag’empaka ku mukutu gwa intaneeti oluvannyuma bakole eby’okulwanirira ensonga nga bagoberera enteekateeka ebaweereddwa mu katabo akabayigiriza.
answer_d: Omusomesa alagira abayizi okusoma “ebbaluwa eri omukungu w’ekitabo ky’amawulire” era bagattulule ensonga ezirimu. Oluvannyuma, balina okukola ebbaluwa yaabwe eri omukungu w’ekitabo ky’amawulire, nga bawa ensonga zaabwe ku nsonga eyo.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina ekyokuna mu ssomero lya secondary ali mu kusomesa essomo ly’Empisa z’Abantu. Ebigendererwa by’ekibiina kino kwe kusobozesa abayizi okutegeera engeri z’obufuzi ez’enjawulo ezaateekebwawo edda. Okutuukiriza kino, abawa ebitundu okuva mu kitabo kya Plato ekiyitibwa Republic n’abasuubira okuggyamu n’okunnyonnyola engeri z’obufuzi ezirambikiddwaamu. Mu kiseera kino, ekibinja ky’abayizi kinyumya ku nsonga eno: singa demokulasi kati etwalibwa ng’emu ku ngeri z’obufuzi ezisinga obulungi, lwaki Plato aginnyonnyola ng’engeri y’obufuzi eyonoonefu? Oluvannyuma basaba omusomesa okubayamba okugonjoola ekizibu ekyo. Okusinziira ku mbeera eyo waggulu, kuyambagana kwa ngeri ki omusomesa kw’asaanidde okukozesa okuluŋŋamya abayizi n’okugonjoola ekibuuzo kyabwe?
answer_a: Abagamba okugeraageranya gavumenti ey'ekinnakyemalira ku demokulasiya, okwekenneenya enjawulo, ate oluvannyuma bakozese ekibalangulo kya Plato.
answer_b: Akolera ku bibuuzo by'abayizi ng'omukisa okwetegereza ennyo endowooza ya Plato ku gavumenti ennungamu era agigeraageranya n'engeri za gavumenti eziriwo kati.
answer_c: Annyonnyola nti gavumenti ez’omulembe guno tezisobola kutuukiriza bulungi ngeri Plato gye yannyonnyola gavumenti olw’obuzibu obungi obuli mu nkola yazo ennaku zino.
answer_d: Abagamba okuddamu okusoma amakulu ga Plato ku demokulasiya, oluvannyuma, wamu nabo, akola okugeraageranya wakati w’eki Plato kye yateesa n’amakulu ga demokulasiya aga kati.

question: Omusomesa ateekateeka omutendera gw'empisa mu kibiina ky'akamalirizo mu ssomero lya siniya era mu musomo oguddako agenda kwogera ku kiruubirirwa kino: "Okukulaakulanya endowooza z'omuntu ku butonde bw'omuntu, okuzimba obuggya n'okubuusabuusa emisingi gy'abawandiisi abamu." Mu kitundu ekisooka eky'ekibiina, omusomesa agenda okunnyonnyola abayizi endowooza z'abantu ezannyonnyolwa Hobbes ne Rousseau era ateekateeka omukolo oguddako ogusobozesa abayizi okwenyigira mu byo ebiri mu mutendera guno n'okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa. Ku mikolo gino wammanga, gumu ku gyo gwe gwandibadde omuganyulo eri abayizi okukola ku kiruubirirwa ekyogeddwa?
answer_a: Abayizi bawaayo olwogerero mu maaso g'abayizi bannaabwe nga balaga ebyokulabirako ebya bulijjo ebikwata ku ndowooza z'abantu mu mbeera ey'obutonde ng'okusinziira ku Hobbes ne Rousseau.
answer_b: Abayizi bakola omuzannyo ogw'okugeraageranya nga balina okusalawo oba bakole nga Hobbes bwe yalowooza oba nga Rousseau bwe yalowooza okusobola okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa.
answer_c: Abayizi bakuba olukiiko olwetoloolevu nga beekubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga y'okunyaga amaduuka amanene, nga basinziira ku musingi gw'enzikiriza y'ebyafaayo by'abantu ogwa Hobbes ne Rousseau.
answer_d: Abayizi baleetawo ekizibu eky’empisa ekikwaatagana n’okukwata ekifo ku lw’abakozi oba omukama, nga basiima ku musingi gw’ebyobufuzi ogwa Hobbes ne Rousseau.

question: Omusomesa alambalambula ebitundu eby'enjawulo okuva mu biwandiiko bya bafilozofa n'abayizi abali mu S.6, omuli Nietzsche ne Sartre. Omuyizi abuuza oba nga waliwo akakwate konna wakati w'ekigambo kya Nietzsche: “Katonda afudde” n'okutya okw'amaanyi okw'obulamu okusinziira ku Sartre. Mu by'okuddamu bino wammanga, kiki ekyinza okutangaaza okubuusabuusa kw'omuyizi n'olulimi olugazi n'obumalirivu obw'omwoyo?
answer_a: Yee, waliwo akakwate, okuva nga endowooza ya Sartre esibuka ku ebyo abafirosoofa nga Nietzsche bye baali baamaze okutegeeza.
answer_b: Yee, waliwo akakwate, kubanga byombi bikwatagana n’endowooza z’ebyefirosoofi eziwakanya ebyo abantu bye babadde balowooza nga bituufu.
answer_c: Yee, waliwo akakwate, kubanga ebigambo “Katonda afudde” n’okutya okw’amaanyi byombi byoleka obwetwaze bw’abantu oba eddembe lyabwe mu mpisa nga bwe balina okusalawo n’okukola ekituufu oba ekikyamu mu ngeri etagoberera Katonda.
answer_d: Yee, bikwatagana, okuva abawandiisi bombi balowooza ku mbeera y'omuntu mu maaso g'obulamu, n'obulabe obutaliiwo n'obunafu bw'obulagirizi bw'empisa okuluŋŋamya ekikolwa ky'omuntu, ekifuuka eky'akubagiza awatali mitindo gya Katonda oba eby'ekigendererwa.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okuna mu siniya asomesezza ku kunenyeza kwa Kant okw’obusobozi bw’okumanya ate n’asaba abayizi be okuddamu ebibuuzo ebimu mu bbaluwa zaabwe. Bw’amaze okubyetegereza, akizuula nti abasinga obungi mu kibiina batabudde eky’okuddamu kwa Kant ku kintu eky’okumanya n’endowooza y’abamagezi abakugu. Mulimu ki ogwandibadde omutuufu abayizi okutegeera n’okwawula endowooza ya Kant?
answer_a: Abayizi bakunganya ebipimo ebikulu eby'endowooza y'abamagezi n'eya Kant, nga babiwandiika mu buwandiisi bwabwe.
answer_b: Abayizi banoonyereza ku birowoozo bya Kant ne Locke, oluvannyuma ne baleeta ebikulu bye baakola.
answer_c: Abayizi bakola okunoonyereza okugeraageranya ku birowoozo by'abamanyi ku byafaayo, abamanyi ku magezi, n'ebirowoozo bya Kant, nga bayita mu maapu eraga endowooza.
answer_d: Abayizi bakola ekibalangulo ky'ebigambo bya Kant, eby'okukakasa, n'eby'amagezi.

question: Omusomesa w’omwaka ogw’okuna mu Siniya alina enteekateeka ng’alina ekigendererwa eri abayizi be okwekenneenya n’okunnyonnyola omulamwa gwa Nietzsche ogugamba nti "tewali mazima, wabula okunnyonnyola", era ng’eno y’ensonga lwaki asazeewo okukozesa ebikozesebwa okuva mu byamawulire. Mu bintu bino wammanga, kiki ekikwatagana n’ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a:
**Ebyafaayo eby'obulimba:** Eggwanga lya Uganda ligenda kuggala amasomero gonna olw'ekirwadde kya COVID-29

**Obujulizi obulaga nti si bituufu:** Minisita w'ebyenjigiriza yafulumizza ekiwandiiko n'ategeeza eggwanga lyonna nti tewali masomero gaggalwa era n'agamba nti ebyogerwa bya bulimba. Ebiwandiiko byonna ebya gavumenti biraga nti amasomero gakola nga bwe galina okukola.
answer_b: Laga ebifaananyi ebitongeddwa n'ebyennyini eby'abantu abalaga ku ttivvi.
answer_c: Ndiwulira ebipande by'amawulire bibiri ebikwata ku kikolwa kye kimu naye nga birina endowooza ez'enjawulo.
answer_d: Laga omuwendo gw'abo abaagala n'abo abatagaala ekifaananyi ekikwata ku lukungo lw'amawulire.

question: Omusomesa yekebejjezza essomo ly'ekitundu ku epistemology mu mwaka ogwokusatu mu siniya, ng'asinga kwetikka ku nsonga za Descartes ezikwata ku butonde. Mu kwekebejja, akiraba nti abayizi abamu boogera ku nsonga ezikwata ku ndowooza y'obutuukirivu ezifaanana bweziti: "Okusinziira ku Descartes, singa abantu bonna balina endowooza y'obutuukirivu kye kitegeeza nti ffenna twali tulina okumanya ku kintu ekituukiridde, era n'olwekyo endowooza eno yateekebwa mu bwongo bwaffe. Era singa ffenna tumanyi ekintu ekituukiridde, kitegeeza nti Katonda ye yatonda ebintu bino." Ng'okwatagana n'ensonga za Descartes, buzibu ki mu nkola y'okuyiga obuyinza okuteeberezebwa okuva mu kuddamu kuno?
answer_a: Abayizi tebaasobodde kukwanaganya buziba bw'ekibuuzo kya Descartes ekikwata ku kintu ekijjuvu ekiva mu birowoozo byaffe bye tulaba.
answer_b: Abayizi tebaategeera nteekateeka ya Katisiya ku lw'ensonga y'okutuukirira ng'endowooza ey'omuzaaliranwa esibuka mu bwakalimagezi.
answer_c: Abayizi tebannyonnyodde bulungi bye baayogedde, nga batabula okunnyonnyola kwa Descartes ku nsonga y’ekiteeso kya Katonda ekiva mu butuukirivu.
answer_d: Abayizi tebaategeka bulungi ngeri y’okulambulula ebirowoozo ebiraga obubaka bwa Descartes obulaga nti Katonda gy’ali okusinziira ku ndowooza y’obutuukirivu.

question: Omusomesa w’essomero eyaakamaliriza ery’okuna ateekateeka okunnyonnyola engeri Plato gye yalowoozaamu ebyobufuzi, era olw’ensonga eno yeetaaga okukebera oba abayizi balina obumanyirivu obumala. Ndowooza ki eya Plato abayizi gye balina okumanya okusobola okutegeera obulungi engeri Plato gy’alowoozaamu ku Ggwanga?
answer_a: Ebika by'emyoyo
answer_b: Obubiri bwa Platonic
answer_c: Omulamwa gw'ebirowoozo
answer_d: Omulamwa gw'empisa ennungi mu by'obufuzi

question:
Omusomesa akola ku kitundu ky'Emanya mu mwaka ogwokusatu mu siniya n'abayizi be, era ng'omulimu ogugenderera okutuukiriza ekigendererwa: "Okutegeera obutandikwa bw'okumanya kw'omuntu", bateesa okusoma n'okunnyonnyola Ekitabo kya Descartes eky'Okusooka ku Kulowooza ku By'obutonde.
Kino ku bintu abayizi bye baasooka okuyiga kiki ekyetaagisa okuba nga baakimanyiira ddala okusobola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky'ekibiina?
answer_a: Enneeyisa z'Obwongo n'Obukakafu obw'Embeera
answer_b: Amakulu g'ekigendererwa ky'obuntu n'engeri y'okumanya ebintu.
answer_c: Endowooza ya Tabula Rasa n'ebipimo
answer_d: Empewo z'ensolo n'akatimba ka pineal

question:
Omusomesa w’ekibiina ekya 12, mu somo ly’empisa, agenda kukolera wamu n’abayizi be ku mulamwa gw’endowooza ya Spinoza ku mpisa ezitali nkalakkalira.
Ntegeeza ki okuva eri Spinoza kye kikulu abayizi okuba nga bamaze okukitegeera okusobola okutegeera endowooza ye ku mpisa ezitali nkalakkalira?
answer_a: Obulamu obw'empisa ennungi
answer_b: Enneewulira ez'omusingi
answer_c: Okwagala okw’amagezi
answer_d: Enneewulira ez'amaanyi

question: Omusomesa atunula mu nkulaakulana y'ebipande ebigeraageranya, ebyakolebwa abayizi b'omwaka ogw'okuna mu siniya, ku birowoozo bya Descartes ne Locke. Omulimu gwali gwakugenderera okuyamba abayizi okutegeera n'okugeraageranya ekizibu ky'okumanya mu bawandiisi bombi. Mu mulimu ogumu, kizuuliddwa nti abayizi baleese ebirowoozo ebisaana abawandiisi, naye okugeraageranya wakati waabwe tekukoleddwa. Ku magezi ag'okuyamba gano wammanga, kki ekikuyamba okumanya obulungi engeri omuntu gy'akolamu era ne kimulung'amya okutuuka ku kigendererwa?
answer_a: Ebirowoozo ebireeteddwa bituufu era birungi, naye byetaaga okwawulwamu mu bitundu eby’enjawulo okusobola okukyusaamu omulimu gwabyo.
answer_b: Amawulire agakwata ku buli muwandiisi mutuufu. Gabuzeeko okutegekebwa okusinziira ku bibuuzo oba endowooza ze bafaanagana naye nga balina eby'okuddamu n'amakulu ag'enjawulo, okusobola okukola okugeraageranya okumala.
answer_c: Mulimu mulungi. Wabula, okwongera okutereeza okugeraageranya kuno, kyetaagisa okukitereeza ennyo okusinziira ku ndowooza y'omufirosoofa buli omu gy'alina.
answer_d: Ebirowoozo bya buli muwandiisi byawuluddwa bulungi. Kati, okukola okugeraageranya okutuufu, kikulu okutegeka endowooza n'obwegendereza obusingako mu kulambulula ensonga.

question: Omusomesa wa siniya, mu somo erikwata ku Bizibu by’Obuntu, agenda kukebera ekigendererwa kino: “Okukozesa mu ngeri ennung’amu era ey’obwegendereza omulamwa gwa Heidegger ogw’obulamu obutali butuufu.” Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekisaanira okukozesebwa okulaga obukugu obuyigiddwa obukwatagana n’ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a:
ENTEETEERA y'emirimu gya bulijjo egy'olubeezi ekyoleka obulamu obutali butuufu

Olunaku olw'Olwokubanza:
- Zuukuka ng'okozeeko ssaawa bbiri, weekolere ekifaananyi ekirabika obulungi n'okiteeka ku mikutu gy'ebyempuliziganya.
- Genda mu kafyuu ka kawunga akasinga okuba ow'ebbeeyi, olagire ekintu ekisinga okuba eky'omulembe era okifotole.
- Kola okukung'aana okumu ku mirimu, naye olabe ng'okozesa essimu yo okusinga okukola.
- Genda mu gym, weekolere vidiyo ng'ozannya omupiira gw'omubiri, naye togezaako nnyo.
- Genda mu resitulanti ennungi, olagire emmere eringa ennungi, naye togimaliriza.
- Mala olunaku lwo ng'olaba TV era nga weebaka mangu.

Olunaku olw'Olwokubiri:
- Zuukuka, weekolere ekifaananyi nga weebase, okiteeke ku mikutu gy'ebyempuliziganya.
- Genda mu maduuka, ogule engoye ezisinga okuba ez'ebbeeyi, naye tozambala.
- Kola okukung'aana okumu ku mirimu, naye olabe ng'oyogera ku bulamu bwo okusinga okukola.
- Genda mu spa, weekolere eby'okulongoosebwa, naye togezaako nnyo.
- Genda mu bbaala, onywe omwenge omungi, naye togezaako kunywa nnyo.
- Mala olunaku lwo ng'olaba TV era nga weebaka mangu.

Olunaku olw'Olwokusatu:
- Zuukuka, weekolere ekifaananyi nga oli mu mmotoka yo, okiteeke ku mikutu gy'ebyempuliziganya.
- Genda mu maduuka, ogule ebintu eby'omulembe, naye tobikozesa.
- Kola okukung'aana okumu ku mirimu, naye olabe ng'oyogera ku by'obufuzi okusinga okukola.
- Genda mu sinema, olabe firimu ennungi, naye togezaako kulaba nnyo.
- Genda mu kisaawe, ozine, naye togezaako kuzina nnyo.
- Mala olunaku lwo ng'olaba TV era nga weebaka mangu.

Olunaku olw'Olwokuna:
- Zuukuka, weekolere ekifaananyi nga oli mu nnyumba yo, okiteeke ku mikutu gy'ebyempuliziganya.
- Genda mu maduuka, ogule eby'okulya eby'ebbeeyi, naye tobilya.
- Kola okukung'aana okumu ku mirimu, naye olabe ng'oyogera ku mbeera y'obudde okusinga okukola.
- Genda mu pulogulaamu y'ebyemizannyo, ozannye, naye togezaako kuzannya nnyo.
- Genda mu kazannyo, ozannye, naye togezaako kuzannya nnyo.
- Mala olunaku lwo ng'olaba TV era nga weebaka mangu.

Olunaku olw'Olwokutaano:
- Zuukuka, weekolere ekifaananyi nga oli mu ofiisi yo, okiteeke ku mikutu gy'ebyempuliziganya.
- Genda mu maduuka, ogule ebitabo eby'ebbeeyi, naye tobisoma.
- Kola okukung'aana okumu ku mirimu, naye olabe ng'oyogera ku bantu abalala okusinga okukola.
- Genda mu konsati, owulirize omuziki, naye togezaako kuwuliriza nnyo.
- Genda mu kabaga, olye, naye togezaako kulya nnyo.
- Mala olunaku lwo ng'olaba TV era nga weebaka mangu.

Olunaku olw'Olwomukaaga:
- Zuukuka, weekolere ekifaananyi nga oli mu buliri bwo, okiteeke ku mikutu gy'ebyempuliziganya.
- Genda mu maduuka, ogule eby'okwewunda eby'ebbeeyi, naye tobyewunda.
- Kola okukung'aana okumu ku mirimu, naye olabe ng'oyogera ku by'obufuzi okusinga okukola.
- Genda mu muzannyo, olabe, naye togezaako kulaba nnyo.
- Genda mu kabaga, onywe, naye togezaako kunywa nnyo.
- Mala olunaku lwo ng'olaba TV era nga weebaka mangu.

Olunaku olw'Olwomusanvu:
- Zuukuka, weekolere ekifaananyi nga oli mu bbaafu yo, okiteeke ku mikutu gy'ebyempuliziganya.
- Genda mu maduuka, ogule eby'okuzannya eby'ebbeeyi, naye tobizannya.
- Kola okukung'aana okumu ku mirimu, naye olabe ng'oyogera ku bantu abalala okusinga okukola.
- Genda mu kifo ky'okusabira, osabe, naye togezaako kusaba nnyo.
- Genda mu kabaga, ozine, naye togezaako kuzina nnyo.
- Mala olunaku lwo ng'olaba TV era nga weebaka mangu.
answer_b: Londa ekirowoozo ky'omutwe ekiraga ebintu bisatu ebireetera omuntu okutaba omwesimbu mu bulamu bwe.
answer_c: Kola kolagi ng'okozesa eby'amawulire n'ebirango bya magazini ebiraga obulamu obutali butuufu.
answer_d: Omutindo gw'ennono gwe gutyaza omuntu obutaba mutuufu mu bulamu bwe?

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa abadde akolera wamu n’abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw’okubiri mu siniya ku mutwe "Okunyweza Eggwanga n’Enkyukakyuka mu Demokulasiya y’Abantu mu Chile mu Kitundu Ekisooka eky’Ekyasa ekya 20". Okukebera oba abayizi bategeera enkola y’okutondawo Ekkubo ly’Abantu Abatutumufu mu Chile, abasaba okukung’aana n’abayizi bannaabwe bataano balonde ekimu ku bibinja by’ebyobufuzi ebya wakati-ku-kkono ebyaliiwo mu Chile mu 1937 ng’omutwe (abalwanirizi b’obukomunisti, abakomunisti, abakyukakyusi, n’abajeemu) era nga basinziira ku biwandiiko ebyakozesebwa mu masomo agayise, baddemu ekibuuzo kino: "Lwaki ekibiina kyandegattiddwa ku Kkubo ly’Abantu Abatutumufu?". Oluvannyuma abasaba okukoppa olukiiko lwa paalamenti omuli buli kibiina ekikola kirage ensonga lwaki ekibiina ky’ebyobufuzi kyandegattiddwa oba tekyandegattiddwa ku Kkubo ly’Abantu Abatutumufu. Nga twekenneereza ekitundu ekyokubiri eky’omulimu guno, ku bikolwa bino wammanga kiki ekisobola okukeberwa?
answer_a: Bano bategeera embeera eyavaako ekibiina kya Popular Front okubaawo
answer_b: Baawula endowooza ezaakola omusingi gw'Ekibiina Eky'Obugagavu.
answer_c: Banannyonnyola emisingi gy'endowooza y'ekibiina kya Popular Front.
answer_d: Bannyonnyola ensonga lwaki Ekitongole kya Popular Front kyatondebwawo

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okubiri mu siniya, mu mutwe ogugamba Nti Okuva mu Nsi Eyawuliddwaamu Ebibinja Ebibiri okudda mu Nsi Enzigumivu: Olutalo Olunyogovu, alina ekigendererwa ky’okukolera ku kigendererwa kino: "Okutegera enkyukakyuka enkulu ez’ebyobufuzi n’ensi yonna oluvannyuma lw’olutalo olunyogovu", ng’asinziira ku by’omukulu ebiri mu by’okusomesa eby’endowooza y’ebyafaayo. Okukola kino, omusomesa awa abayizi maapu bbiri ez’obuaya, emu eya 1960 n’endala eya 2000, ng’abasaba okunnyonnyola ebintu bisatu ebifaanagana n’ebintu bisatu ebyawukana mu by’obufuzi n’ensi yonna. Kintu ki ekikulu mu by’okusomesa ekyogerwako ekisinga okukolebwako mu mulimu ogwoogeddwa?
answer_a: Tegeera ebifaayo ebikulu eby’ebiseera ebyayita mu budde n’ebifo eby’enjawulo.
answer_b: Laga engeri ebintu by’omu byafaayo gye bikyukaamu okusinziira ku biseera.
answer_c: Lagawo enkolagana wakati w'ebipimo eby'enjawulo n'ebigero by'obunene bw'ebifo eby'ebintu ebigwa ku bantu
answer_d: Tegeera nti ebyafaayo kyakuzimbibwa kw'abantu ekikulaakulana mu biseera n'ebifo.

question: Kiri ku mirimu gino wammanga kiyinza okuyamba abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw’okuna okutegeera enjawulo wakati w’ekifo ekigerekerevu n’ekifo ekitakyuka eky’ebintu ku lukalala oba maapu?
answer_a: Omwana yenna akuba akabonero ku kifo ekiraga ebintu ebyasiigiddwa ku kalangala akalaga ebifo (coordinate grid) era oluvannyuma n'annyonnyola ebifo by'ebintu ebyo ng'asinziira ku bintu ebirala ebiriraanye. Mu nkomerero, bageraageranya ebifo byombi ne bagabana ebyo bye bakutte.
answer_b: Mububiri, omuyizi omu asiiga ekifananyi ky’ekintu ku katabo akalimu emigalamiro n’emisinde, ng’akiteekawo okusinziira ku biragiro ebiweereddwa omuyizi omulala. Oluvannyuma, bakyusa emirimo era bakola ekintu kye kimu. Mu nkomerero, bageraageranya ebifo we biri era bagabana ebyo bye bakutte.
answer_c: Mububiri, omuyizi omu awa omuyizi omulala ebiragiro nga basinziira ku katabo akalaga ebifo okutuuka ku mmeeza entegeke mu kisenge. Oluvannyuma, bakakasa oba ekifo ky'emmeeza ekiri ku katabo kye kintu kye kimu n'ekifo ky'emmeeza ekiriwo ddala era bagabana ebyavaamu.
answer_d: Ng’omuntu kinnoomu, abayizi boogera ku ngeri ez’enjawulo omuntu gy’ayinza okutukira mu bifo eby’enjawulo nga basinziira ku maapu esaliddwa ku katengo akalaga ebifo okusinziira ku layini ezisalagana era nga kuliko akabonero akalaga obwolekero bw’empewo, oluvannyuma balyoke bageraageranye era bakubaganye ebirowoozo ku byo bye boogedde n’ekibiina.

question: Mu kibiina ky’abanaabaasoma ekya 5, omusomesa akolera wamu n’abayizi be ku kiruubirirwa kino: "Okunoonyereza, okwogera ku, n’okuzuula obubenje obw’obutonde obukosa ekitundu mwe babeera, gamba ng’omusisi, amazzi ag’ekibuyaga, amataba, okuserenga kw’ettaka, n’ebiwuka by’omuliro." Wamu n’ekyo, ekigendererwa kwe kussa amaanyi mu nkulaakulana y’endowooza y’ebyobuwangwa, kwe kugamba, obusobozi okwetegereza n’okuzuula emikwano emingi egiteekebwawo wakati w’abantu n’obutonde bw’ensi, nga tukubiriza omwoyo ogw’amaanyi ogw’okukuuma obutonde bw’ensi mu bayizi. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekisobola okukubiriza endowooza y’ebyobuwangwa era ne kikwatagana n’ekiruubirirwa ekyateereddwawo?
answer_a: Abayizi balambulula ebika by'akabi akaliwo mu kitundu kyabwe, okusinziira ku bitundu bye bukosa, nga bakizuula enkola engeri gye bikolebwamu.
answer_b: Abayizi bakola maapu y’ekitundu kyabwe nga balaga obubonero bw’obubenje obw’obutonde obubaddewo mu kitundu kyabwe emyaka egiyise.
answer_c: Abayizi bannyonnyola akabenje akabaddewo mu kitundu kyabwe, nga bannyonnyola ebikaviiriddeko, obuzibu bwe kaleese ku bantu, n'engeri ze bayinza okukozesa okukendeeza obuzibu obwo.
answer_d: Abayizi banoonyereza ku katyabaga akali mu kitundu kyabwe, nga balaga kika ki, ebintu byakyo ebikulu byebiri, era emirundi emeka akabaddewo mu myaka ekikumi egiyise.

question: Omusomesa akola ku ntandikwa y’ekivvulu ky’obufuzi eky’omu 1973 n’abayizi be ab’ekitongole eky’omukaaga. Omu ku bo amuyimiriza okumubuuza kino: “Omusomesa, sitegeera bw’otugamba nti: ‘Embeera eno yali nsonga y’ekivvulu ky’obufuzi eri munnabyafaayo ono, naye si eri omulala.’ Kati, Abamerika baalina obuyinza bungi ku kivvulu ky’obufuzi eky’omu 1973? Yee oba nedda?”. Kiki ekikyamu ekiyinza okutegeerwa okuva mu kibuuzo ky’omuyizi kino ekikwata ku byafaayo, ng’essomo?
answer_a: Okukendeeza ebyafaayo ne bibeera ng’ebikwata ku nkola za bweru eze ggwanga.
answer_b: Okutaputamu ebirowoozo by'obufuzi mu nnyingo z'eby'afaayo
answer_c: Endowooza y'ebyafaayo ng'ebbaluwa entuufu etaliimu bulimi ku bintu ebyayita
answer_d: Ennyonnyola y'ekintu ekimu ekireetera ebintu eby'emabega okubaawo

question: Omusomesa ow'ekibiina eky'omusanvu agenda kukebera oba abayizi be "Bannyonnyola enkyukakyuka ezaava mu nkukulukusa y'obulimi (Neolithic revolution) mu mukwano omuntu n'obutonde okuyita mu kukebera obubaka." Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, kiruwa kiyinza okusobozesa omusomesa okukungaanya obujulizi obulaga nti ekigendererwa kituukiddwaako?
answer_a: Saba abayizi buli omu ku lwake ye okulonda ensibuko z’ebyamawulire eziri ku intaneeti ezikwata ku mbeera z’Obulimi obw’Ensi Enkadde (Neolithic) era babunnyonnyole.
answer_b: Saba abayizi okukolera awamu mu bubiri okwekenneenya obubonero obw’enjawulo obukwata ku kyekera ky’Obulimi (Neolithic revolution) oluvannyuma balage endowooza enkulu eza buli kamu.
answer_c: Basabye abayizi okukolera awamu nga babiri babiri okuzuza ekyaati ekiraga enjawulo n’obufaananyi wakati w’ebintu bibiri ebyogera ku nteekateeka y’ebyobufuzi n’embeera z’abantu eyassibwawo mu mulembe gwa Neolithic.
answer_d: Baagaliza abayizi buli omu ku lwabwe okuwandiika omutereeza ogulimu obubaka obukakasa ku nkyukakyuka ezaaleetebwawo emirimu gy'ebyobulimi mu mulembe gwa Neolithic nga basinziira ku nsibuko ez'enjawulo.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekibiina eky’omusanvu akola omutwe ogw’okubalukawo kw’embeera z’abantu ezasooka. Mu kimu ku bibiina, ekigendererwa kigambwako: “Tegeera enteekateeka y’ebyobufuzi ey’e Misiri ey’edda.” Ekimu ku bikolebwa ebisabiddwa abayizi kwe kusoma ensibuko y’amawulire ku ngeri obuyinza bw’ebyobufuzi obwa Falaawo mu Misiri gye bwatondebwa, oluvannyuma okukebera okusinziira ku kigendererwa ekyateekebwawo. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekyandiraze okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky’abayizi?
answer_a: Banannyonnyola enkola y’okugatta obwakabaka bwa Misiri, ekyanyweza gavumenti enkulu
answer_b: Balawula engeri y’okutegeka abasinga amaanyi mu bwakabaka, abalonda omukulembeze mu bannaabwe okukulembera.
answer_c: Bategeera ebikolwa by'abakabona, abaawa amaanyi eri omukungu okusobola okuzimba empya era n'okusinza bakatonda baabwe
answer_d: Banannyonnyola engeri okulumbagana kw'amawanga amalala, okufuna ettaka ly'e Kiyira, bwe kwaviirako omuserikale omukulu okuyimuka mu buyinza eyasobola okugawangula.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’omunaana akola ku mutwe gw’ogw’okuyimuka kw’Obwakabaka bw’Amawanga, ng’agenderera okukulaakulanya obukugu bw’okusoma n’okwekenneenya ensibuko z’ebyamazima, naddala obwesigwa bw’ensibuko, ng’asinziira ku by’omukulu ebikwata ku kutendeka okulowooza okw’eby’emabega. Okutuukiriza kino, ateesa okusoma ensibuko eno wammanga: Tewali n’omu ayinza okuwakanya nti amaanyi [...] g’abafuzi geeyongera nga eby’obugagga by’ebyenfuna n’omuwendo gw’amaggye bwe byeyongera. Ate era, etteeka lyakuumanga abantu ssaako n’amaanyi ag’amateeka ag’abaami. Bannamateeka be bamu ku bintu ebikulu eby’okukyusa obwakabaka. Era kino kyali kituufu naddala mu nsi omutindo gw’obwannamateeka [...] gwe gwali guzimbye ku mateeka g’Abaruumi ab’edda [...] (Bulaaya ey’Enkyukakyuka. 1517 - 1559, Elton Geoffrey (1999).) Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekigenda okukulaakulanya butereevu okwekenneenya obwesigwa bw’ensibuko abayizi kye bakola?
answer_a: Okakasa ekika ky'ensibuko, oba ya ntandikwa oba ya bubiri, okusinziira ku mwaka we yasindikiddwa.
answer_b: Tegeera Elton Geoffrey bw’ali n’ekigendererwa kye bwe yali awandiika ensibuko.
answer_c: Laga obumanyifu bw'omuwandiisi ku byafaayo by'obwakabaka bw'amawanga.
answer_d: Ekitabo kino bwe kigamba ku maanyi ga kabaka kiyamba kitya okutegeera okukula kw’obwakabaka obw’eggwanga?

question: Omusomesa agenda kutandika okukolera awamu n'abayizi be ab'ekibiina eky'omukaaga nga yeesigama ku nteekateeka eno: Essomo ly'Ekibiina eky'Omukaaga: Enteekateeka y'ebyobufuzi eya Chile n'emisingi egissibwawo Ssemateeka. Ekigendererwa ky'okuyiga: Okunnyonnyola ebimu ku bintu ebikulu ebigendererwa mu nteekateeka ya demokulasiya eya Chile, omuli okwawulwamu kw'amaanyi g'eggwanga n'obukiikirizi bwago okuyita mu bakungu abalondebwa (bameeya, ababaka ba konsiri, ababaka ba palamenti, abaseneta, ne Pulezidenti). Akabonero k'okukebera: Okutegeera engeri enkulu enteekateeka ya demokulasiya ey'obukiikirizi gy'erina okuba nayo. Ku bino ebiri wammanga, biruwa ebikulu abayizi bye balina okumanya okusobola okutuukiriza ekyo ekyesuubirwa?
answer_a: Okutabaala kw'abantu abalala
answer_b: Obuyinza n'obuvunaanyizibwa
answer_c: Ekika ky'Obufuzi bw'Eggwanga
answer_d: Enkola y’okulonda abakulembeze

question: Mu kibiina ky’okusatu mu siniya, omusomesa ali ku mutwe gw’eby’okumanya, Ssaayansi, n’Amazima, naddala enjawulo ya Hume wakati w’ekikwatako n’ekirowoozo ng’ensibuko y’okumanya. Bw’amaze okunnyonnyola nti ebika byombi eby’okutegeera biva mu bumanyirivu era bye bikola omusingi gw’okumanya kwonna, omuyizi abuuza: “Naye mu bwongo bwaffe, tulina ebirowoozo ebimu eby’ebintu ebyefuufu ebitaliwo mu butuufu era bye tulaba nga byeyoleka bulungi nga bwe biri ebikwatako. N’olwekyo, si kumanya kwonna kwe kuva mu bumanyirivu.” Kibuuzo ki mu kutegeera emiramwa gino okuva mu njigiriza ya Hume ku by’okumanya kye kiyinza okutegeerwa okuva mu kwetaba kw’omuyizi kuno?
answer_a: Awa omuntu ataliwo empisa ez'obuzaaliranwa.
answer_b: Akakasa emisingi gy'omukwataganyo ku birowoozo, so si ku ndowooza.
answer_c: Alonda ensibuko y'ebintu ebikwatwako mu bwongo, so si mu bumanyirivu.
answer_d: Agamba nti endowooza zirina amaanyi n'obunnabulamu bungi okusinga ebirowoozo ebiva mu kumanya.

question: Omusomesa wa Filosofia ow’ekibiina eky’okuna, ku nkomerero y’essomo ku Empisa za Aristotle, alina ekigendererwa ky’okukebera obusobozi bw’omuyizi okutuuka ku kigendererwa kino: "Okutegeera endowooza ya Aristotle ku bulungi bw’empisa." Ku biragiro bino wammanga, kiruwa ekiraga nti omuyizi atuuse ku kigendererwa ekyo?
answer_a: Bageraageranya ebikolwa eby'enjawulo nga basinziira ku ndowooza y'omuzizo.
answer_b: Balaga ebikolwa eby'enjawulo ebisaana omulamwa gw'ekigereeso kya wakati ekituufu.
answer_c: Baawula ebikolwa ebya kyeyagalire era eby'eddembe okuva ku bikolwa ebitali bya kyeyagalire era ebitali bya ddembe
answer_d: Bategeera endowooza ya Aristotle ku bulungi mu mbeera ez’enjawulo

question: Omusomesa, ng’akolera mu mwaka ogw’olubereberye ogw’ekisulo ku mutwe gw’ebyenkulakulana, okutumbula amakolero n’obuzibu: enkula n’engeri entondeka empya ey’omulembe guno bwe bikosa Chile n’ensi yonna, ategese ng’ekimu ku bigendererwa by’okukebera okulaba oba abayizi be balina endowooza ennungi okuyita mu kwebulula engeri enkulu z’ebyenfuna ya Chile mu kitundu ekyokubiri eky’ekyasa ekya 19. Ku biragiro bino wammanga eky’okukebera, kiki ekiraga nti abayizi batuukirizza ekigendererwa ekyateesebwa?
answer_a: Bannyonnyola enkyukakyuka z'ebyenfuna eza Chile mu kitundu ekyokubiri eky'ekyasa ekya 19.
answer_b: Banannyonnyola ku nkola za by'enfuna ezaateekebwawo Gavumenti mu kitundu ekyokubiri eky'ekyasa ekya 19.
answer_c: Balaga engeri ez’enjawulo eziviirako enkulaakulana y’ebyenfuna ya Chile mu kitundu ekyokubiri eky’ekyasa ekya 19.
answer_d: Bawakanya ku ndowooza ezikwata ku ngeri y’enkulakulana y’ebyenfuna ya Chile mu kitundu ekyokubiri eky’ekyasa ekya 19.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky’okubiri, mu kitundu ekiyitibwa Ensi Enkolagana, agenda kwogera ku kiruubirirwa kino: “Okunnyonnyola enteekateeka z’ebyobufuzi n’endowooza z’Amerika ne Soviet Union mu kiseera ky’olutalo olw’obunnyogovu,” okutambulira awamu n’essira eriteekeddwa ku bya Social Sciences: endowooza y’ebyobufuzi n’ebyenfuna. Nga tutunuulidde embeera eno, ku mirimu gino wammanga, gumu ku mirimu gino omuyizi gw’alina okukola ogutuukana n’ekiruubirirwa ky’ekibiina n’essira eriteekeddwa ku by’okusoma?
answer_a: Noonya ku intaneeti ku ngeri y’enteekateeka z’ebyenfuna eza Amerika ne Soviet Union gye zaakozesebwamu n’engeri gye zaakosaamu ebyobufuzi, ng’otunuulira ebifo byabwe eby’obuyinza mu kiseera ky’olutalo olw’ebbanga, oluvannyuma owandiike omulimu ogunnyonnyola ku nsonga eyo.
answer_b: Teekawo omuteeko ogulaga ebintu eby'omugaso ebyaliwo mu byafaayo mu by'obufuzi n'eby'enfuna mu nkola z'eby'obufuzi ez'Amerika ne Soviet Union, oluvannyuma onnyonnyole mu katundu akatono enkyukakyuka ze zaakola mu kiseera ky'olutalo olw'ebbanga.
answer_c: Soma ebifa mu bitabo eby’abayivu abalala ebikwata ku ngeri Amerika ne Soviet Union gye zaali zeeyisaamu mu kiseera ky’olutalo olw’ebbanga, oluvannyuma owandiike ebyo by’ofunye ku ngeri gye zaali zeeyisaamu mu byobufuzi n’engeri gye zaali zikolamu emirimu gy’ebyenfuna, era olonde ebirungi n’ebibi ebiri mu ngeri buli emu gye yakozesa.
answer_d:
Lwakulonda olugero olw’enjawulo okwawula ebifanana n’ebyenjawulo wakati w’emirimu gya Amerika n’egya Soviet mu kiseera ky’olutalo olw’obutiti, nga tukozesa ebipimo by’okwekenneenya eby’emikago gy’amagye n’ebyenfuna egyassibwawo n’amawanga amalala n’ebifo byabwe eby’obuyinza.

| Ekipimo ky'Okwekenneenya | Amerika | Soviet Union |
|---|---|---|
| Emikago gy'Amagye | NATO (North Atlantic Treaty Organization): Omukago gw'amawanga agali ku ludda lwa Amerika mu North Atlantic, ogwateeka essira ku by'okwerinda awamu. | Warsaw Pact: Omukago gw'amawanga agali ku ludda lwa Soviet Union mu Eastern Europe, ogwateeka essira ku by'okwerinda awamu n'okukuuma obuyinza bwa Soviet. |
| Emikago gy'Ebyenfuna | Marshall Plan: Enteekateeka y'ebyenfuna eyayamba amawanga ga Western Europe okuddamu okuzimba oluvannyuma lw'olutalo olw'okubiri olw'ensi yonna, n'okunyweza enkolagana z'ebyenfuna. | COMECON (Council for Mutual Economic Assistance): Omukago gw'ebyenfuna wakati w'amawanga g'omu Eastern Europe n'obuyambi bwa Soviet Union, ogwateeka essira ku by'obusuubuzi n'enkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna. |
| Ebifo eby'Obuyinza | Western Europe, Latin America, ne bitundu by'omu Asia (nga South Korea ne Japan): Yayita mu mikago gy'ebyenfuna n'eby'amagye, Amerika yafuna obuyinza mu bitundu bino, n'ekuumirawo enkola y'obufuzi ey'ekikungu (capitalism) n'eddembe ly'obuntu. | Eastern Europe, ne bitundu by'omu Asia (nga North Korea ne Vietnam): Soviet Union yafuna obuyinza ku mawanga gano ng'eyita mu Warsaw Pact n'obuyambi bw'ebyenfuna, n'ekuumirawo enkola y'obufuzi ey'ekikomunisti (communism). |
| Ebifanana | Byombi byakozesa emikago gy'eby'amagye n'ebyenfuna okunyweza obuyinza bwabyo n'okusaasaanya endowooza zaabyo ez'ebyobufuzi n'ebyenfuna. | Byombi byakozesa emikago gy'eby'amagye n'ebyenfuna okunyweza obuyinza bwabyo n'okusaasaanya endowooza zaabyo ez'ebyobufuzi n'ebyenfuna. |
| Ebyenjawulo | Amerika yateeka essira ku nkola y'obufuzi ey'ekikungu n'eddembe ly'obuntu, ate Soviet Union yateeka essira ku nkola y'obufuzi ey'ekikomunisti. | Amerika yateeka essira ku nkola y'obufuzi ey'ekikungu n'eddembe ly'obuntu, ate Soviet Union yateeka essira ku nkola y'obufuzi ey'ekikomunisti. |

question: Omusomesa ateekateeka okukola emirimu esatu egy’omuddiring’anwa, ng’akozesa obubaka, abayizi be ab’omwaka ogw’okubiri mu siniya basobole okutegeera obutakkaanya mu ndowooza obwakulembera amaanyi amakambwe mu kiseera ky’olutalo olw’obutiti; mu nkola eno, akoze enteekateeka z’emirimu egy’enjawulo egisoboka. Ku mirimu egidiring’ana gino wammanga, guli gwani ogutuukira abayizi okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyatuukirizibwa?
answer_a:
1: Ku maapu y’ebyafaayo eraga ekiseera ky’olutalo olw’ebbanga, balaga ebifo we waaliwo obutabanguko obw’amaggye obutali butereevu wakati w’amawanga amanene.

2: Bwe bamala okubigattira awamu, balonda lumu ku ntalo ezo ze balaze ne boogera ku nkyukakyuka ze zaleeta mu byobufuzi n’ensonga z’ensi.

3: Bakola akatonnyeze akalaga entalo ezo, nga balaga obuwanguzi n’ebigwi bya buli limu ku mawanga amanene mu ntalo ezo.
answer_b:
1: Balambula ebipande bya propaganda okuva mu US ne USSR, nga bagerageranya embeera mwe byakolerwa, ekigendererwa, n'ebirala.

2: Bwegattira awamu, balonda kimu ku byamaguzi eby'amaanyi era bakola ekipande ekikikiikirira.

3: Bategeka olukung'aana n'ebipande wansi w'omutwe "USA vs USSR," okusalawo okuyita mu kulonda obuyinza obusukkulumu bwali bwa ani.
answer_c:
1: Balambulula ebiwandiiko okuva mu bitongole by'obukessi ebikulu ebya buli ggwanga (KGB ne CIA), nga bategeera ebigendererwa byabyo.

2: Nga batadde wamu, bakola ekiwandiiko ekiraga mu bwangu ensonga eziweereddwa buli kitongole ku ngeri gye kikolamu emirimu gyakyo.

3: Bakola akatabo akageraageranya buli pulaani y'ebyobufuzi ebitongole by'obukessi eby'amawanga gegezaako okutaasa.
answer_d:
1: Beebuuza ku mitimbagano gy'enternet okunoonya ensibuko z'ebikwata ku nkola enkulu ez'eby'amagye amaanyi agaalina mu kiseera ky'olutalo olw'ebbanga.

2: Bwe bamala okubikuŋŋaanya, basoma ensibuko ezo ne bafuna endowooza enkulu eza buli emu.

3: Baleeta endowooza zaabwe mu maaso g'ekibiina, nga balaga enjawulo n'obufaananyi mu nkola ezaakozesebwa buli limu ku maanyi ago.

question: Mu kitundu ekiyitibwa Okuwummula mu Demokulasi, omusomesa mu kibiina kya siniya eyookubiri ateekateeka okukola okunoonyereza ku bujjuvu bw’ebifaananyi. N’olwekyo, yateekateeka ebibuuzo eby’enjawulo abayizi be okubuuza ebifaananyi bino: (Ekifaananyi ky’ekimu ku bisenge by’ekibiina kya Ramona Parra ebyakolebwa mu Gwomwenda 1972 nga kigendereddwaamu okutaasa Obumu obwa Bonna. Ekifaananyi kino kyalagibwa mu ggwanika ly’ebyamazima erya Museum of Contemporary Art. Oluvannyuma kyataasibwa mu 2002 Eduardo "Mono" González.) Mu bibuuzo bino wammanga, kibuuzo ki ekigendereddwaamu okukola okunoonyereza okw’omunda okw’ekifaananyi ng’ensibuko y’ebyafaayo?
answer_a: Ensulo erina akakyamu?
answer_b: Omulamwa omukulu ogwolesebwa mu nsibuko y'ebigambo gwe guli ki?
answer_c: Omugatte gw'ebyafaayo ogw'ensibuko gwe guli gutya?
answer_d: Ani omuwandiisi w'ensibuko eno?

question: Omusomesa mu mwaka ogw’okubiri mu Ssomero lya Sekendule anaatera okumaliriza okukola ku kitundu okuva mu Nsi ey’emitendera ebiri okudda mu Nsi ey’obumu. Olutalo Olunyogovu. Nga omulimu ogw’okumaliriza, bateekateeka okukebera, mu bintu ebirala, ekigendererwa kino: "Okutegeera okukulaakulana kw’eggwanga erifuna obuyambi." Mu bigattika bino wammanga, kiki ekisobozesa okugera ebyo omuyizi by’ayize?
answer_a:
Balaga enkolagana wakati w’ebibiina by’obufuzi okutandikawo obufuzi obutereevu obwa gavumenti ku katale, ekiyinza okuyamba okukendeeza obutabanguko mu mbeera z’abantu.

Bawakanya okuteekerateekera enteekateeka ezitongole ez’obuyambi bwa gavumenti ezigenderera okukendeeza obutabanguko mu byenfuna n’embeera z’abantu.
answer_b:
Bannyonnyola omukono gwa gavumenti mu kutereeza eddembe ery'obuntu eryo ebitongole by'obwannannyini bye bitasobola okukakasa ng'enkola y'obuyiggo bw'abalwadde (welfare state) etandikibwawo mu Bulaaya.

Bannyonnyola okunenyezebwa okwakolebwa ku nkola y'obuyiggo bw'abalwadde (welfare state) ku nsonga y'ebizibu by'ensimbi bye yaleeta mu Bulaaya, ekyagiviirako okukoseddwa mu myaka gya 1970.
answer_c:
Bawulawo engeri entondeka y’amateeka g’akatale n’okugabanya obugagga ezateekebwawo mu Bulaaya enkola ya gavumenti ey’obuyambi bw’embeera z’abantu bw’ekola.

Bawakanya obukulu bw’endagaano wakati wa gavumenti, bannamakolero, n’ebibiina by’abakozi okubumba n’okukuuma obunywevu bw’enkola ya gavumenti ey’obuyambi bw’embeera z’abantu.
answer_d:
Bannyonnyola enjawulo wakati w’ebintu ebyali bigendererwa by’obulamu obweyagala ebyateekebwawo mu Bulaaya, gamba ng’okuteekawo amateeka g’embeera z’abantu.

Bannyonnyola engeri enteekateeka y’obulamu obweyagala bwe yateekebwawo mu Bulaaya gye yasinga okussa essira ku ddembe ly’embeera z’abantu okusinga eddembe ly’obuntu n’eddembe ery’ebyobufuzi.

question: Omusomesa, mu kitundu ekiyigiriza ku Nkomerero y'olutalo olw'ebbanga, yategeka omukolo eri abayizi be aba 10 okwetegefuza okwekenneenya ensibuko enkulu. Olw'ensonga eno, yabaleetera okusoma n'okuddamu ebibuuzo nga basinziira ku katundu kano okuva mu kitabo ekyawandiikibwa omuntu ku bulamu bwe: Entandikwa y'endowooza ya "perestroika" yali kukakasa okw'amaanyi nti tetuyinza kuddamu kubeerawo nga bwe twali. Mbadde nkyogera ku kino emirundi mingi era ssigezaako kuddamu kukyogera wano. Sijjuddeko, wadde akatundu akatono, nti nze nnali ntandisi w'enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu bulamu bw'eggwanga lyaffe. Ebyajjira mu butangaavu ku byafaayo byaffe, nga byebaziddwa "glasnost," byakakasa mu ngeri ey'obukambwe n'etakyuka nti enkola eyakolebwa okusinziira ku mitindo gy'obukangavvu n'obufuzi bw'ekinnakyemalira tekyali kigumiikirizika, si lwa nsonga za mpisa zokka, wabula era n'olw'ensonga z'omusingi z'eggwanga mu by'enfuna n'eby'embeera z'abantu. Kyali kisindise eggwanga ku nkomerero era ne kiteeka ku kizingo ky'obuziba. Era kyagenda mu maaso okubaawo okuyita mu maanyi, eby'obulimba, okutya, obutafaayo bw'abantu, wamu n'obuyambi obw'omusaayi ogw'ekinnakyemalira ogwasaasaanya ebyobugagga era ne gunafuya obusobozi bw'ebiseera eby'omu maaso. The August Coup. The Truth and its Consequences, Mikhail Gorbachev. Kino kye kimu ku bibuuzo ebyaddiddwa omuyizi nga basinziira ku mutundu oguli waggulu: Kiki ekyali kifaanaanyi ekiri mu mbeera mwe biteekeddwawo enkola za Perestroika ne Glasnost mu eyali USSR? Perestroika: okukkiriza nti omuntu tasobola kuddamu kubeerawo nga bwe yali. Glasnost: nkola eyakolebwa okusinziira ku mitindo gy'obukangavvu n'obufuzi bw'ekinnakyemalira nga tekikyali kigumiikirizika. Bunafu ki obulabika mu kuddamu kw'omuyizi, ku bikwata ku busobozi okutaputa ensibuko?
answer_a: Muwe eky’okunnyonnyola ensibuko okuva mu ndaba y’omuntu ku lulwe.
answer_b: Tebissa byeyoleka obutereevu obuteetaaga kunnyonnyola.
answer_c: Essira ku kunnyonnyola ensibuko y'ebigambo awatali kubuusabuusa ku biteeso byayo.
answer_d: Leeta ennyingo ezinnyonnyola ebiri mu bigambo by'omuwandiisi nga tolowoozeza ku ky'abadde aluubirira.

question: Omusomesa, mu kiseera ky’essomo ku Mateeka n’Obutuuze, ayagala okumanya oba abayizi be ab’omwaka ogw’okuna mu siniya baategeera emirimu gy’Ekitongole Ekiwoza emisango mu Chile. Okukola kino, ateekateeka omukolo mwe balina okutegeera emirimu gino mu mbeera eza bulijjo. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekisobola okukakasa oba abayizi batuuse ku kigendererwa eky’okuyiga eky’ekigendererwa?
answer_a: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga y'abantu abagenda okubeera mu Chile okwekenneenya oba obwenkanya mu mateeka buguumizibwa.
answer_b: Okukola akakonge nga olondobola amawulire okubala ebikolebwa singa etteeka eriyisiddwa akakiiko akakulu lyenyigira mu ddembe erikuumirwa ssemateeka.
answer_c: Okukola omuzannyo ogw'omusalaba ogw'omuwawaatiro ku kabenje k'ebidduka okuteekawo enkola zaakwo.
answer_d: Okunoonyereza ku buzzi bw'emisango obusinga okubaawo mu kitundu kyabwe mu mwaka oguwedde

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina ekyokusatu mu Siniya, mu kitundu ekikwata ku Butaka, entegeka, n'okwetaba mu by'ekitundu, oluvannyuma lw'okukwata ku kiruubirirwa kino: "Okwekenneenya embeera z'obukuubagano bw'obutaka okusinziira ku ndaba y'obwenkanya mu by'embeera z'abantu n'obutonde", akola omulimu gw'okukebera ng'asinziira ku kunoonyereza ku mbeera eno: Mu kitundu kyaffe, mu budde bw'ekiro, amayumba mu kitundu kya Porvenir gatera okubaawo amataba emirundi egisukka mu gumu mu mwaka, olw'okuba tewali muyenga gw'amazzi ag'ekiro, emiyenga gatera okuzibikira olw'obutalabirira bulungi, era n'enguudo zirina obuserengefu obutono. Ekitundu kya Porvenir kirina obunafu obw'amaanyi mu by'embeera z'abantu, ng'ekitundu kinene ku maka ge kya bumeemezi bwa wansi. Obukuubagano bw'obutaka obuliwo mu kitundu kya Porvenir bukwaatagana n'obwenkanya mu by'embeera z'abantu n'obutonde? Lwaki? Bw'aba ng'akebera eby'okukebera, omusomesa asanga eky'okuddamu kino: Embeera mu kitundu kya Porvenir ky'ekyokulabirako ky'obuteekateeka obulungi obw'ekibuga n'amaanyi ag'obuteenkanankana mu by'enfuna ku bulamu bw'abantu. Kyokka, tebukwaatagana nnyo n'obwenkanya mu by'embeera z'abantu n'obutonde kubanga si buzibu bwa butonde. Nga twekenneenya eky'okuddamu ekiri waggulu, ku bikolwa bino wammanga eby'omusomesa, ng'ebiwakanya okukulaakulanya, kiyamba omuyizi okukiriza ensobi ye?
answer_a: Nkusaba weekenneenye ebizibu by’obutonde bw’ensi ebiri mu kitundu kino. Waliwo obuzibu bwonna obukosa obulamu bw’abantu obuyinza okulambululwa okusinziira ku bwenkanya mu by’embeera z’abantu n’obutonde bw’ensi?
answer_b: Okusobola okwongera okunyweza ensonga yo, nkuwadde amagezi okwekenneenya obuzibu obulala abantu b’omu kitundu ky’e Porvenir bwe bayinza okwolekagana nabwo. Obuzibu buno busobola okufuuka ensonga z’obwenkanya bw’embeera z’abantu n’obutonde bwabwe?
answer_c: Nkulagira okulowooza ku bino: obanga ebintu bino biyinza okukosa obutonde bw’ensi obugumira mu kitundu kino? Bwe kiba kityo, tekyandikosezza n’obwenkanya mu by’embeera z’abantu n’obutonde bw’ensi eri abantu ababeera mu kitundu ekyo?
answer_d: Bwe kiba nti ebitundu ebisinga okubonaabona olw’amataba bye bisinga obwavu, tekitegeeza nti byolekedde embeera y’akabi abantu abalala mu bitundu ebirala gye batolekeddwa? Kino kikwatagana n’obwenkanya mu by’embeera y’abantu n’obutonde bw’ensi?

question: Omusomesa ku mutendera gwa ‘kindergarten’ ateekateeka okukebera obukugu bw’omuyizi mu kiruubirirwa kino okuva mu mutindo gw’okutegeera embeera z’obuwangwa n’obuntu: “Okunnyonnyola emboozi ezimu ezikwata ku bintu eby’omugaso ebyaliwo emabega mu kitundu kyabwe ne mu ggwanga, nga bakozesa ebintu nga ebifaananyi, vidiyo, ebikozesebwa, oba ebintu ebibakiikirira.” Ku miramwa gino wammanga, gumu ku gyo gw’osobola okukozesa okukungaanya obujulizi obulaga obukugu bw’omuyizi mu kiruubirirwa kino?
answer_a: Baanjye okuzannya emikolo gy'ennono egy'enjawulo egy'omu kitundu kyammwe.
answer_b: Basaanidde okukubirizibwa okuwaayo ebiwandiiko ku bukulu bw'abantu ab'enjawulo mu kitundu kyabwe.
answer_c: Bakyawaaze okukola alubaamu erimu ebifaananyi eby'enjawulo eby'emikolo gy'amaka.
answer_d: Baanjule okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bwetaavu obwavirako enkyukakyuka mu tekinologiya.

question: Omusomesa ateekateeka essomo ly'ekibiina eky'okutaano ng'alina ekigendererwa kino: "Okulambulula obulungi bw'ebifo eby'obutonde ebinene ebya Chile." Ku mirimu gino wammanga, gwe gujja okusobozesa okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyo?
answer_a: Zimba ekifaananyi ekiraga obulungi bw’ekifo mu kitundu ky’obutonde, ng’otumbula ebifo ebisinga okumanyika, okukiraga mu luggya lw’essomero.
answer_b: Noonya ku mukutu gwa www.sernatur.cl okumanya ebikwaata ku byobugagga eby'obutonde n'emirimu gy'ebyenfuna egikwatagana n'ebitundu byonna, okubireeta mu kifaananyi ekiraga engeri gye bikwatagana.
answer_c: Buuza banno b'omanyi ababaddewo mu bitundu ebirala eby'ensi, obabuulire ebikwata ku mbeera y'obudde n'ennono ze baalabye, okukola ekiwandiiko ky'olutalo.
answer_d: Nkola brocuwa y'abalambuzi erina ebifaananyi by'ebifo ebirungi eby'obuwangwa ng'eraga emigaso n'obubi bw'okukyala mu bitundu ebyo, okuteekateeka olulaga lw'ebipande.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky’omukaaga, bwe yamala okukubaganya ebirowoozo n’abayizi be ku nsonga ezaleeta obuzibu bw’ekibuuzo ky’embeera z’abantu mu Chile, agenda kukebera obusobozi bw’abayizi be okugeraageranya obubaka obw’enjawulo okusobola okufuna eby’okulabirako ebituufu ku mboozi z’edda. Okukola kino, awa abayizi be ebiwandiiko bino okusoma:  "Eddagala ly’embeera eno ey’obwavu lisangibwa mu njiri, eragira abagagga okutunuulira abaavu ng’abooluganda era ne bafaayo ku mbeera yaabwe era ne babayamba mu bwetaavu, era eragira abaavu okufuba okufuna mu mulimu omwesigwa ebyetaagisa obulamu." Ekyakusiddwa mu Monsignor Mariano Casanova, Ssaabalabirizi w’e Santiago (1891)  "Enjigiriza y’obutafaayo evumiddwa. Twetaaga okuteekamu ssente okuyamba n’amaanyi okutandikawo embeera empya ezigenda okutuggya mu mbeera abantu abali ku mutendera ogwa wansi gye beewulira nga banyigirizibwa." Ekyakusiddwa mu Ekibuuzo ky’Embeera z’Abantu, A. Ortega (1884)  "Kituuse abaana bonna abakozi, abeegattira mu kibiina, beegatte wamu mu mubiri gumu era bakole amaanyi n’obuyinza bw’Eggwanga. Leero ffe, abaana b’abantu, tukola ng’ebikozesebwa ebibi eri abasajja abalina zaabu." Ekyakusiddwa mu Vicuñera, erinnya eryekikungo ery’omuwi w’amawulire ku olupapula lw’amawulire olwa Los ecos del Taller (1897)  Kibuuzo ki ku bino wammanga ekisobozesa okukungaanya obukakafu nti abayizi bageraageranya obubaka okumaliriza ku kibuuzo ky’embeera z’abantu?
answer_a: Abawandiisi abasatu balina ndowooza ki ku mulimu gw'abakozi?
answer_b: Buli muwandiisi awaayo nteekateeka ki okukola ku buzibu bw'ekibuuzo ky'embeera z'abantu?
answer_c: Kizibu ki eky'embeera z'abantu n'enfuna y'ebyenfuna abawandiisi abasatu kye bakkaanyizaako?
answer_d: Abawandiisi abasatu bawadde ki kyebawadde ekyenjawulo okumalawo embeera y'abakozi?

question: Omusomesa alina ekigendererwa kino: "Okunnyonnyola obukulu bw'okwegatta kw'abakyala mu bulamu bw'olukale mu kyasa ekya 20" eri abayizi be aba kitaano. Okukola kino, agenda kusaba abayizi be okwekenneenya ensibuko y'ebyafaayo eno: Soma ebiwandiiko bino: [. . .] Nlwaniridde eddembe ly'abakyala okulonda, si lwa kuba ndi mulwanirizi wa ddembe lya bakyala asusse, wadde okuba nti ndowooza nti abakyala basinga abasajja oba nti eddembe ly'abakyala okulonda lyenyini ddagala lya buli buzibu bw'eggwanga, wabula lwa nzikiriza yange. Nzikiriza mu gavumenti y'abantu, ey'abantu, era eri abantu. Ndowooza nti abantu bonna ababeera mu nsi, tebuliiko langi yabwe oba kika kyabwe, buwangwa bwabwe oba kikula kyabwe, ndowooza zaabwe eza byabufuzi oba nzikiriza yaabwe ey'eddiini, balina eddembe okukyuusa ebyo ebinaabaawo mu nsi yaabwe. Ebbaluwa okuva eri Elena Caffarena (Santiago, Janwali 1949) Okusinziira ku biwandiiko ebiri waggulu, bukulu ki obw'ebyobufuzi okulwana kw'abakyala nga Elena Caffarena kwe kwabangawo mu kufuna eddembe ly'okulonda? Lwaki omulimu omusomesa gw'aleese gutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky'ekibiina nga twetegerezza ennyo ebikugu by'obumuntu obutuuze?
answer_a: Kubanga kikkiriza okwogera n'okuba n'endowooza ey'eddembe ku kwegattibwa kw'abakazi mu kyasa ekya 20.
answer_b: Kubanga kikuza okutegeera okusingako akakulu k'olutalo olwakulemberwa abakazi mu Chile
answer_c: Kubanga kiyambako okutegeera n'okulambika ku kimu ku birubirirwa by'obweneggwanga demokulasiya mu Chile mwesigamiziddwa.
answer_d: Kubanga kinyweza obukugu mu kwebulula ensibuko y'ebintu okusobola okutegeera obulungi enkulakulana y'eby'okulonda mu Chile mu kyasa ekya 20.

question: Omusomesa agenda kwogera eri abayizi be aba P.7 ku mutwe ogw'Emirembe gy'Obuwangwa obw'Amaanyi egy'Obuntu. Mu ssomero erisooka, omusomesa agenda kuyigiriza abayizi engeri y'okulondamu ensibuko z'ebyamawulire, okuzikozesa mu kunoonyereza ku nsibuko era n'okukubiriza enkulaakulana y'endowooza y'eby'emabega. Kutegeera ki abayizi kwe balina okukulaakulanya okusobola okulonda obulungi ensibuko y'ebyafaayo?
answer_a: Laga ebika by'amawulire ensibuko by'ewaayo.
answer_b: Tegeera abantu ab'ebyafaayo ensibuko gy'eyogerako.
answer_c: Kekkereza obukulu bw'ensibuko y'ebyo ebigenda okwogerwako.
answer_d: Njawuloza ku nsonga enkulu ezikwata ku nkola y'enteekateeka eziri mu nsibuko.

question: Mu kibiina kya musanvu, mu somo erikwata ku Myaka wakati, omusomesa ateekawo ekigendererwa: "Okukulaakulanya okutegeera ebyafaayo nga twawula enkolagana z’ensalo wakati w’Abakristaayo, Abasiraamu, n’Abayudaaya mu kibuga ky’e Iberian." Okutuukiriza kino, asaba abayizi okukola olugero olulaga enkolagana ezaaliwo mu kiseera ekyo. Bw’aba ng’alondoola omulimu guno, akiraba nti abayizi bangi tebategedde bulungi nkolagana z’ensalo wakati w’Abasiraamu, Abakristaayo, n’Abayudaaya. Ng’ekyokulabirako, asanga emirimu mingi egirimu ebintu ebifaanana bino: "Erinnya lyange nze Muhamed, ndi Musiraamu omuto abeera mu Bufuzi bw’Abasiraamu obwa Cordoba, famire yange yonna egoberera eddiini y’Obusiraamu era tutunda emikeeka mu katale. Tetukolagana na Bakristaayo wadde Abayudaaya kubanga bakaafiiri." Nga twetegereza obujulizi obukuŋŋaanyiziddwa, mulimu ki omupya omusomesa gw’ayinza okuteesa eri abayizi okukwasaganya ekigendererwa ekyateesebwa, ng’asinga kwesigama ku kukulaakulanya okutegeera ebyafaayo?
answer_a: Nnyonnyola buli omu ku lwabwe bw’alowoza abantu abaabeeranga ku lukalu lwa Iberian bwe baabeeranga era nga bwe bakolagananga, ng’osinziira ku kulaba ebifaananyi.
answer_b: Mu bibinja, mukiikirire embeera ez’enjawulo ez’obumu ezabangawo mu kibuga kya Iberian Peninsula, nga musinziira ku biwandiiko by’abantu ab’enjawulo abaakibeeramu.
answer_c: Maliriza chati ku bikwata ku nzikiriza z’amadiini ez’abantu abaabeera mu kitundu kya Iberian Peninsula, nga osinziira ku kusoma ekitabo ekikulungamya, ng’olambulula engeri gye zaakosa enkolagana yaabwe.
answer_d: Weebale okutangaaza enkolagana eziriwo wakati w'Abakristaayo n'Abasiraamu nga tusinziira ku mawulire agali ku yintaneeti, ng'olaga obufaananagana n'enjawulo ku ebyo ebyaliwo ku lukalu lwa Iberian mu myaka gy'enkulakulana.

question: Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, kkiru ki ekikulaakulanya obukugu bw’abayizi mu kukebera ensibuko z’ebyanjuliziddwa?
answer_a: Bakyalira eggwanika erimu eby'obuwangwa by'Abazungu ebiragiddwa mu bifaananyi n'ebintu.
answer_b: Balonda ebifaananyi ebikwaata ku nnono z'eggwanga okuva mu bizinga by'ebifaananyi by'amawanga ag'enjawulo.
answer_c: Babuuza abantu abava mu nsi ez’enjawulo ne boolekera bannaabwe mu kibiina empisa enkulu ez’ennono z’ensi ezo.
answer_d: Bakola pposita ezikwata ku ngeri z’okugattika enzikiriza z’abantu abava mu mawanga amalala nga basinziira ku bifaananyi eby’enjawulo era ne bazireeta mu kibiina.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina ky'abaana abato atendeka abaana be ku kigendererwa kino: "Okugeraageranya engeri ebintu bya tekinologiya gye bikolebwamu, omugaso gwabyo, n'engeri gye bigasa mu ngeri ez'enjawulo." Okukola kino, omusomesa asooka n'aleeta ebintu bya tekinologiya eby'enjawulo, ng'abuuza abaana kye babimanyiiko nga tannaba kubannyonnyola mugaso gwabyo. Oluvannyuma, omusomesa abasaba okunoonyereza, okwetegereza, n'okunnyonnyola ebintu bya tekinologiya eby'enjawulo ebikozesebwa awaka: amasimu, obusawo bw'enviiri, ebyuma by'okukaliza enviiri, essaawa, leediyo, mbooki, n'ebirala. Oluvannyuma, omusomesa agabanya abaana mu bibinja era n'abalagira okukungaanya ebintu bya tekinologiya, nga bajjukira bye baalabye. Ekimu ku bibinja kikungaanya ebintu mu ngeri etali ntegeerekeka. Bwe babuuziddwa, abalimu bagamba nti tebamanyi ngeri gye bakikolamu. Kukola ki omusomesa ky'asaanidde okukola okwongera okunyweza okuyiga mu kibiinja kino?
answer_a: Omusomesa ajja n’abalaga ensobi gye bakoze. Abaalaga engeri y’okugattamu ebintu n’annyonnyola lwaki kikolebwa bwe kityo, oluvannyuma n’abalagira okugenda mu maaso nga bagoberera ekyokulabirako.
answer_b: Omusomesa ababuuza: Mujjukira bye twalaba? Twayogera ku ki? Buli kimu ku bino kigendererwa ki? Kati, muyinza okubigattika mutya? Oluvannyuma, omusomesa abawa obudde okubigattika n'abalondoola.
answer_c: Omusomesa ajja gyebali n’abagamba nti bakola bulungi, naye balina okwetegereza engeri ebintu gye bifaanana okusobola okubigattulula mu biti byabyo mu ngeri entuufu. Oluvannyuma, omusomesa abawa obudde obulala okuddamu okugezaako.
answer_d: Omusomesa agamba nti baayogera ku mirimu gya buli kintu. Oluvannyuma, omusomesa alaga nti ebimu bikozesebwa mu ffumbiro, ebirala mu kaabuyonjo, n'ebirala bya kukoleramu. Oluvannyuma, omusomesa abawa obudde okubigattulula.

question: Omusomesa w'ekibiina eky'okutaano, mu kitundu eky'Ebipimo by'ebintu eby'omulembe ogw'omulembe guno, ateesa eri abayizi okukola empaka ku by'okuggwaawo kw'ebintu mu bwangu n'enkolagana yakwo n'obugunjufu. Oluvannyuma lw'ebiva mu mpaka, akiraba nti ekibinja ky'abayizi kigatta endowooza y'okuggwaawo kw'ebintu mu bwangu n'omutindo gw'ebintu. Nga tuloowoza ku mutendera gw'abayizi, kwe kulaga okunnyonnyola kw'omusomesa okuyinza okuyamba okwolesa endowooza eno?
answer_a: Kwe kusalawo oba okuteekateeka enkomerero y’obulamu obugasa obw’ekintu oba tekinologiya, era tekikwatagana na mutindo gwakyo, nga bwe kiba nga waliwo ekintu ekisinga obukugu oba ekirina emirimu emipya kiyisiddwa ku katale.
answer_b: Kwe kusalawo, mu kiseera eky'okukola ebintu, omuntu okumanya ebbanga ekintu kyekinaamala, okukikakasa nti kizzibwa buggya ku nkomerero y'ekiseera ekyo. Kikwatagana n'omutindo ng'ekintu kitandise okubaako obuzibu n'okwonooneka oluvannyuma lw'ekiseera.
answer_c: Ggwe lwe kiseera ebalirirwa omukugu akola ebintu ng’akola ekintu, okukiggwaako omugaso n’okulekeraawo okukozesebwa, nga tekyonoonye mutindo gwakyo, nga bwe kiba nga waliwo ekintu ekirala ekisingako obulungi ekifulumiziddwa ku katale abantu ne bakikyusa n’ekyo kye balina.
answer_d: Kuba kusalawo okutuukirizibwa mu ngeri ezitali zimu, okugeza, olw’obutabaawo bw’ebitundutundu eby’ekiyungirizo oba obwetaavu bw’okugula ekintu ekipya ekijja mu kifo ky’ekyo, okukyuka kw’ebintu okwa bulijjo n’okwegomba kw’abantu okukyusa bye balina, nga tekikwatagana na mutindo gwabyo

question:
Omusomesa w'ekibiina ky'abali mu Siniya emu mu ssomero eggattule abagamba okukola omulimu oguyitibwa "Emprendemás." Mu mulimu guno, abayizi balina okutandikawo kkampuni ewaayo obuweereza okugonjoola obwetaavu bw'ekitundu ky'abantu ekimu. Abayizi bwe baleeta ebirowoozo byabwe nga bannyonnyola obwetaavu bwe bagenda okugonjoola n'obuweereza bwe bagenda okuwaayo, omusomesa akiraba nti ttiimu ezimu tezisobola kutegeera kitundu ky'abantu obuweereza bwe bugenda okutuukirira.
Kiki omusomesa ky'ayinza okuteesa abayizi basobole okumanya ekitundu ky'abantu obuweereza bwe baagala okuwaayo kye bugenda okutuukirira?
answer_a: Saba abayizi okwekenneenya empisa z'abantu be baazuulamu obwetaavu, balyoke bategeere obubaka, oluvannyuma bakole maapu y'okutegeera okumanya kye baagala.
answer_b: Lagiriza ttiimu okulaba vidiyo eraga obuweereza obuweebwa abavuganyi era bategeere ekika ky'abantu be baweereza, oluvannyuma babigeregeranye n'abo abayinza okukozesa ebintu byabwe.
answer_c: Lagiriza ttiimu okunoonyereza ku bitundu by’abantu ebyo mpaka ze ziwa obuweereza obufaanana n’obwezo ze zitegeka, basobole okubyekenneenya era balondoolole enjawulo, nga bategeka omugaso gw’obuweereza bwe bawaayo.
answer_d: Saba abayizi bakole era baweereze ebibuuzo ku mikutu gy'enternet eri abantu ab'enjawulo nga bababuza oba bandikozesezza omulimu gwe balagira, era bakuŋŋaanye ebifaanaanyi okuva eri abo abazzeemu, gamba ng'emyaka, omusaala, omulimu, eggwanga, n'ekikula.

question: Ekibinja ky'abayizi kigenderera okukola ekintu eky'omulembe ekyeetaaga omutemwa gw'amasannyalaze ogutabuddwa okukikozesa. Mu ngeri ki eno wammanga mwemulonda ebikozesebwa bye beetaaga okukola omulimu gwabwe?
answer_a: Ekyuma ekisoddeesa, obukookolo, n'omusumeeno
answer_b: ttape y'amasannyalaze, kabale, n'akambe akasalabiro
answer_c: Kabale, obukookolo, n'ekyuma ekigatta ebintu nga bikulukusiddwa.
answer_d: Pulaaya, akambe akagattisa ebintu n'amasannyalaze, n'ekikongoosa waya

question: Soma embeera eno: Ekibinja ky'abayizi kiweereddwa omulimu gw'okugonjoola ekizibu ky'okutegeka n'okulongoosa ebikozesebwa (emisumeeno, obupangisa, ebipima, emmola, n'ebikata by'emisumeeno) mu kisenge ky'Ebyuma. Bintu ki ebikulu bye balina okulowoozaako nga bateekateeka ekintu/ekigonjoolo kyabwe?
answer_a: Ekyo kiyamba okutereka ebikozesebwa okusinziira ku bunene bwabyo, obuzito bwabyo, n’enkula yaabyo.
answer_b: Ekyo kiyamba okutereka ebikozesebwa mu ngeri ebyangu okutuukirirwa ababikozesa.
answer_c: Ekikolebwa mu bintu ebirina amaanyi okugumira obuzito era ne bikuumira ebikozesebwa ewala n'obunnyogovu
answer_d: Ekikolebwa mu bintu ebyalekkerebwa ate nga kiziyiza enkyukakyuka z'obudde.

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa ayagala abayizi be ab'ekibiina eky'omusanvu okukola emboozi ezikolagana n'omuntu omulala ze basobola okugabana ne bannaabwe mu kibiina era n'abazadde. Mukutu gwa yintaneeti ki ogusinga okusaana okukozesebwa okukola omulimu guno?
answer_a: Sikratshi
answer_b: Excel
answer_c: WordPress
answer_d: Vimeo

question: Ekibinja ky'abayizi kikola okunoonyereza n'okwebuuza ku bakozesa omulundi ogusooka okutegeera ebyetaago byabwe n'ebyo bye baagala. Kino kikwatagana butya n'ekitundu ki ku pulojekiti?
answer_a: Kale. Ntegeera omukozesa.
answer_b: Lagaalaga omukozesa.
answer_c: Kakasa ebiruubirirwa
answer_d: Kebera omulimu guno.

question:
Soma embeera eno wammanga:
Omulimu ogw'okwegattira awamu ogw'ebyenjigiriza bya Tekinologiya n'eby'Omubiri gutegekeddwa, ogulina ekigendererwa eky'okwongera okutegeera engeri enkola y'omubiri ey'amagumba n'enyama gy'ekola.
Bintu ki ebiri mu Byenjigiriza bya Tekinologiya ebyetaagisa okukozesebwa mu mulimu guno?
answer_a: Enkola ennyangu ng’ey’okulaga omulimu gw’ebibinja by’emisajja n’enkolagana yaabyo n’amagumba.
answer_b: Emikutu gy'amasannyalaze ng'ekyokulabirako ekiraga omukola gw'enkola y'obusimu bw'omubiri obw'ebbali
answer_c: Okukozesa obuggya n'okukyusa ebintu ebikozeseddwa mu kukola ebifananyi by'omubiri ogukwataganya amagumba n'emisumbu gy'amagumba.
answer_d: Omulamwa gw'entegeka okulaga enkolagana wakati w'ebitundu by'omubiri ebikola ku magumba n'emiswaani.

question: Mu butonde bw’essimu bwekyusizzaamu ng’ekikozesebwa mu tekinologiya, kibuuzo ki omusomesa ky’ayinza okubuuza okuleetawo obutakkaanya mu birowoozo by’abayizi be?
answer_a: Simu entambuze ey’omulembe gwa leero erina mirimu ki egy’amaanyi egisinga ku ssimu enkade?
answer_b: Ennono y’essimu ekulakulanye etya mu byafaayo?
answer_c: Simu eno ey’omukono ey’amagezi nkulaakulana oba kulemererwa mu by’embeera z’abantu?
answer_d: Mitundu ki gy'obwetaavu bw'omuntu egimazibwawo n'endabika y'amasimu ageesigala?

question: Soma embeera eno: Abayizi b’ekibiina kya Middle School bategeka olugendo olw’enkomerero y’omwaka, era nga banoonya engeri z’okutambula ezitali zimu. Balina ebbaluwa eziraga omuwendo okuva mu makampuni agatali gamu, naye batabukiddwa era tebamanyi kye balina okutunuulira okusobola okusalawo. Omukulu w’ekibiina abawa amagezi okutwala ebyo bye banoonyeza mu kibiina ky’Ebyemikono, basobole okukitegeera nga basinziira ku biragiro ebirambika engeri y’okunoonyereza ku mirimu. Mu mbeera eno, kiragiro ki ekisooka ekirina okukozesebwa mu kukebera engeri ez’enjawulo okusobola okusalawo ku ngeri y’okutambula esinga obulungi?
answer_a: Kozesa omutindo ogukola nga bw’osaba olugendo olw’okugezesa era n’okukakasa nti buli kimu kitambula bulungi.
answer_b: Sinzira ku musingi gw'ebyenfuna, ng'otunuulira embalirira yaabwe n'ebbeeyi eziweereddwa.
answer_c: Kozesa ekigereeso eky’amateeka, okukakasa nti eky’entambula ne ddereeva balina ebiwandiiko ebiriwo.
answer_d: Kozesa ekigerageranyo ky’okumatiza omuguzi, nga okunoonyereza ku mukutu gwa yintaneeti ku byafaayo ebyayita oba okwemulugunya okuyinza okubaawo.

question: Omutendesi y’alina okusooka kukola ki eri abayizi be mu kibiina nga bayita mu kusomesa okwesigamiziddwa ku pulojekiti?
answer_a: Leetawo ekibuuzo ekiggusa oba ekizibu kinene ddala, era okibuulirire.
answer_b: Makuluza g’ebiruubirirwa by’okuyiga n’ebivaamu.
answer_c: Kola okunoonyereza ku mbeera y'ebikolebwa ebipya ebitali bimu.
answer_d: Lungereza abayizi mu bitundu ebitannanoonyerezebwaako.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Abantu b'omukago gw'ebyenjigiriza tebasoma ku bibaawo oba ebipande ebiwanikiddwaako amawulire agabakwatako, olw'ensonga eno, obudde n'obugagga byonoonwa nga amawulire gano gaweerezebwa emirundi mingi. Mu Byenjigiriza eby'Tekinologiya, ekibinja ky'abayizi kisoomoozebwa okwolekera ekizibu kino munda w'essomero lyabwe n'okuteesa ekinonooza eky'etekinologiya okukigonjoola. Batandika okukola ku mitendera egy'enjawulo egy'enkola y'omulamwa; mu gumu ku gyo, bassa essira ku kukebera emikutu gy'empandiika egy'enjawulo. Omulimu guno gukwatagana na mutendera ki ogw'enkola y'omulamwa?
answer_a: Okunoonya amawulire, oluvannyuma lw'okutegeera obwetaavu
answer_b: Okuteekateeka engeri y'okukolaamu ebintu nga tutunuulidde ebyava mu kunoonyereza
answer_c: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkola y'okugonjoola ebizibu
answer_d: Okwekenneenya kw'ekiggo n'okugezesa omulimu gwakyo.

question: Ekibiina ky'abayizi bakomekkereza okukola дневник yaabwe ey'omulimu ogwa buli wiiki. Bwe bamaliriza, batuuza omukutu gwa Gantt eri omusomesa, mwe bateekateeka emirimu egigabiddwa buli muntu mu kutuukiriza omulimu gwabwe. Abayizi bali ku mutendera ki mu pulojekiti yaabwe?
answer_a: Okwekebejja
answer_b: Okuteekateeka
answer_c: Okuzaala ebirowoozo
answer_d: Okuttukiza

question: Abayizi bwe bakola omulimu gwonna, batera okubuuka okuva ku kirowoozo okudda butereevu ku kikolwa, ne balekera awo "enkola" esobola okukakasa obuwanguzi. Enkola eno erimu ebitundu bingi, era mulimu n'ekimu ekikulu mu kunnyonnyola n'okukebera eky'okukola n'okwanguya omulimu ogwo. Ekinnya ky'enkola ki ekyo ekigwanira okwogerwako?
answer_a: Ku chati ya Gantt, eraga ebiseera eby'enjawulo eby'okuteekateeka okutuufu
answer_b: Okuteebereza okw'omutwe, ekikkiriza okulaga eby'okuddamu ebiyinzika okubaawo nga bitunuuliddwa mu ngeri ez'enjawulo.
answer_c: Okutegeeza ekizibu, omuli ekyo ekigenda okukolebwa nga kirambululwa.
answer_d: Okuteekateeka engeri y'okukola ekintu, ekisobozesa okukiikirira engeri y'okukola ekintu n'okukakasa oba okukituukiriza kyakusoboka.

question: Soma embeera eno: Abayizi abali mu S.6 bamaze okuzuula ekizibu mu ssomero lyabwe: tewaliwo we basobola okugula emmere ennungi ey’akawungeezi mu kiseera ky’okuwummula. Okuddamu, bawadde ekirowoozo ky’okuzimba akakiosk akatunda ebibala n’omukyomo, nga bakaddukanya bokka. Bayinza kukolagana na somo ki okutumbula omulimu guno?
answer_a: Mu by'obuyiiya, okuyambako n'obumanyirivu mu nkola y'ebyamamawulire mu kutondekawo akabonero (logo) okubamanyisa.
answer_b: Mu essomo ly'Ekibalangulo, okukola okunoonyereza okw'ekibalangulo okusobola okuzuula omuwendo gw'abayizi abaagala emmere ennungi eri obulamu.
answer_c: Mu by'Obulamu, okukebera ebiriisa n'amaanyi agali mu by'emmere ebitundibwa.
answer_d: Nga tukozesa okusomesa kw’ebyemizannyo, twongere ku mulamwa gw’emmere ennungi n’okukola dduyiro.

question: Omukozi munne mu Sayansi abuuzizza omusomesa w'Ebyemikono ku ngeri y'okukolera awamu omulimu ogugatta amasomo gonna. Ayagala okukolera ku mutwe gw'ebyebbulungirizi, ng'asaba abayizi okukola ttooci eyeeyongera amaanyi nga bakozesa omukono. Mu ngeri ki eno wammanga mw'osobola okwanukula okusaba kw'omulimu ogugatta amasomo?
answer_a: Pulaani ng’okozesa omutindo gw’okuyiga okwesigamiziddwa ku pulojekiti, ng’ogatta ebiri mu byombi, essomo n’obukugu.
answer_b: Kola omulimu gw'okunoonyereza ku mukutu gwa yintaneeti (Webquest) abayizi basobole okuyiga emisingi gy'ebyuma bya kompyuta (technology) ku mutendera ku mutendera.
answer_c: Nnyonnyola ebiri mu masomo gonna ebifaanagana era oteeketeeke ebibiina ebyawamu okukola ku buzibu obulabise.
answer_d: Tegeka amasomo nga weekozesa omutindo ogulina akakwate ku ICT okuteekateeka emirimu gy'abayizi.

question: Omusomesa w'Eby'emikono mu tekinologiya asazeewo okwekenneenya n'abayizi be vidiyo ekwata ebifaayo eyitibwa 'Olukwe lw'Etala', ekwata ku nsonga y'okukola ebintu ebigendererwa okuba eby'omugaso okumala akaseera katono. Kiki ekiyinza okuyigibwa okuva mu somo kino nga tukozesa obuyambi buno obw'okusoma?
answer_a: Laga obwetaavu bw’omuntu obwetaagisa okukola obulungisa, okukyusa oba okutereeza, ng’olowooza ku ngeri gye buyinza okuyambamu.
answer_b: Noonooya engeri ebikolwa eby'omulembe ebikozesebwa mu tekinologiya gye bikosaamu abantu n'obutonde bw'ensi, ng'otunuulira empisa, ebyenfuna, obutonde bw'ensi, n'embeera z'abantu.
answer_c: Tegeeza ku nkola n'enteekateeka y'okugonjoola obwetaavu bw'okuddaabiriza, okukyusa oba okutereeza ebintu oba ebifo, ng'okozesa ebikozesebwa bya ICT.
answer_d: Kebera endowooza ez'ebyo ebiteereddwawo ebigendereddwaamu okukendeeza obuzibu obuleetebwa engeri gye tukozesaamu amaanyi n'ebintu eby'obutonde.

question: Okusinziira ku mboozi eno, kibuuzo ki omusomesa ky’ayinza okubuuza okukubiriza abayizi be okufumiitiriza ku buzibu obuliwo wakati w’ebyuma ebikozesebwa n’engeri gye bikosaamu embeera y’obuntu?
